name: Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss
about: What it is:An original juicy lip gloss with ultra-high shine for a fuller lip effectthe perfect cushiony texture keeps lips hydrated for up to four hours..Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin E: Hydrates and softens lips..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens..What Else You Need to Know:This ultra-shiny lip gloss drenches lips in a nourishing formula for a fuller lip effect. Every press of the tube tip applicator delivers moisturizing gloss with a long-lasting glossy lip shine. Lips are left feeling lusciously juicy with up to four hours of lasting hydration.
ingredients: Polybutene, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Tridecyl Trimellitate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Pentylene Glycol, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Silica, Sodium Saccharin, Ci 15850/Red 7, Tin Oxide, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Parfum/Fragrance
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Wear it alone or on top of your favorite lipstick..-Swipe on creamy shades such as Tickled Pink, an opaque pink lip gloss, alone over bare lips..-Try using glitter lip gloss shades like Birthday Confetti as a lip topper over lipstick for extra juicy lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Perfect basic lip gloss - don’t bother w others
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip gloss honestly. It lasts forever surprisingly - a good four hours with eating and drinking. Very glossy and you don’t need much. Pleasant non-overpowering scent. The magic spell color has shimmer but it’s minimal and only enhances the glossiness. I was a little wary about spending so much on this but I get it now. I’d rebuy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in an order today and was disappointed by the inaccuracy of the colour versus its swatches online. 08 Tickled Pink is described as a creamy dusty rose but I received a cool-toned, magenta-mauve colour. It applied on very sheer so I was able to make the colour work, although it was way too bright compared to my complexion (fair-light olive).   The consistency is quite sticky. I recommend wearing your hair up if you decide to put this on. I do love how moisturizing and long-lasting it is. But again, that's probably due to the stickiness. It looked amazing, however.   I will be exchanging for the clear gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a gloss through free gift with purchase. It's below average. Excellent scent, color pay off poor. It's sticky and tacky to the point that my hair sticks to my lips and doesn't moisturize my lips very well.

reviews.review_text: yes this lip gloss is sticky in a way. pero this is very thick, so glossy, so shimmery. it’s not meant to be rubbed in or used as chapstick, so the stickiness shouldn’t be an issue. you put it on and look fab and you don’t have to reapply for a while. this will NOT move. this shimmer is also so gorg and ultra thin. it’s not glittery or awkward, it’s just very thing shimmer. the pink is also so flattering. love this gloss, just wish it were cheaper 😿

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not like a normal gloss. It is very very thick and you'll want to use it sparingly. After I put this on, I went out and about for a while and then next time I touched my lips...the gloss was full of dead skin. Like, chunky. There was once a lip mask sold by Avon that acted as a chemical exfoliator and when you wiped it off, all the dead skin on your lips came off with it. I don't think that was what this was supposed to do, but it did. And weirdly I am not mad at it. Lips are soft now so...cool.

reviews.review_title: A must have for kids or adults!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using these for past 10 yrs. At least. At first i got it as a sample in a christmas gift set, and i ignored it. One day i couldn’t find my vaseline and needed something on my lips cuz i ate something spicy and applied this, i was shook! It didnt only heal, it protected, hydrated and my lips stayed juicy till morning.  Better than any chapstick or vaseline. Love this stuff

reviews.review_title: Great product, not enough pigment in this shade.

reviews.review_text: Love everything except the shade/pigment. I wanted a soft pink look and it’s essentially a clear gloss. I’m like a light-medium skin tone Asian woman and needed a subtle pink. It’s a bit too subtle. Wish the shade were more noticeable and less clear. Love the other shades, though. The product itself is great. They all feel and smell amazing. Lightly floral and plumping! You def feel a little tingle, not bad like the other plumpers.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shade Tickled Pink. This is a gloss one either loves or hates. I have travel sizes in other shades as well. This one gives my lips some oomph and I say don't squeeze out a lot of product and it's fine. No scent to this shade, as far as I can tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very heavy on the lips which makes it uncomfortable to wear. When you first out it on it feels like a thick glob of Vaseline hit your lips. Barely pigmented (I thought it might be since it LOOKED like a darker pink).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As long as they keep making Juicy Tubes, I'll be buying them. I just wish they had more flavours/colours like in the good ole days - early to mid 2000s! They used to have special edition releases for seasons, or limited editions with the cutest packaging. Daiquiri was just the best! They do a fantastic job of moisturizing lips. When I put this on in the morning, even though it comes off throughout the day, my lips stay moisturized for the entire remainder of the day. Yes, they're sticky, and that's why they're so magnificent! The right amount of sticky, they're smooth sticky and melt between your lips for that impeccable shine. Please bring these back full swing, Lancôme!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i’m picky about glosses but this is a fav. it’s thick which i prefer bc thinner glosses move too much and the thicker formula wears better. it’s very moisturizing and gives a fuller look.

So be mindful that it may cause an allergic reaction in some people.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product looks cheap but I promise the results are not. Even though it is sticky it’s so thick and hydrating and it actually plumps lips without burning my lips off to do so. I will be getting all the colors.
Doesn’t last and makes my lips peel. Too sticky to reapply

reviews.review_title: Always have it in my pocket!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using Juicy Tube gloss since the 90s when I was in my 20s!! It is perfect! When I have dry lips it works like a balm, soothes and moisturizes. The shimmer is beautiful! It is a little sticky, but sticky glosses don't dry out the lips, so I am happy! A classic must-have!

reviews.review_title: exactly what i was hoping for!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: amazing! i have 5 or 6 colors and love it. hydrating and lasts a really long time. the colors are perfect and i’ve never had an issue with packaging or anything.
SO glossy and SO stunning. Literally one application lasts 4+ hours!!! No other lip gloss has that type of staying power!! Honestly the best lip gloss I’ve ever used- WAY better than fenty or tarte

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Best thing for keeping lips pillowy soft. I have multiple colors on hand at all times because I have trouble with lip products making my lips peel and these ones have kept them very healthy. Thicker, sticky lips texture but that’s what I needed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I adore this lip gloss!! I have it in 4 colors but my favorites are Marshmallow Electro and Spring Fling. They're very moisturizing, not sticky, and last my whole 6 hour shift at work. It has a light sweet scent that's not overpowering but smells nice. I will continue to rebuy these until I can't afford it!!

reviews.review_title: Best Lip Gloss for Juicy Plump Lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Back in the day, these used to be all the rage. It was THE gloss to have. I have now discovered it once again, and I gotta say it's even better then I remember it being! My lips feel plump, hydrated, and beautiful. It makes my lips look full (plump) and the gloss is so attractive. It is a thicker consistency, but I think that is why it makes my lips look so good! It also has some very impressive staying power for a gloss. I have used the Dior lip plumping gloss, the Bobbi Brown plumping gloss, and I have to say my favorite is this one! Which I honestly was not expecting. This is a winner in my book.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like juicy tubes, it’s a thick gloss and sticks around a good while for a gloss. I would’ve thought the thickness would be reason to dislike it, but I wound up liking it most because this seems to stay on longer than most glosses. Even through drinking, sure some comes off each time, but I find I still have some there after several unintended blots on the glass or straw. However, I have bought two now and both are awesome in this way, but only one is awesome all around; the other has a downside.  Marshmallow Electro has a light scent that’s actually pretty and enjoyable, like a mild vanilla-ish smell. Love it!  But Tickled Pink I bought recently for more color and it sure is pretty too, and has a light-medium sheerness I suppose. And, when you open it and first apply it, it has a wonderful fruity smell. However, within a few minutes this changed and smelled/tasted yucky!! Almost like a fake and chemically smell/taste that seeps in, to where it’s nauseating and I had to wipe it off within 15 mins. Hopefully it’s just a bad tube, cuz the ME color I have is is not like that at all. I’ll return Tickled Pink and try another, as I do love how they stick around for a while and feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've always loved Juicy Tubes and have been using them since the beginning.  I think they stay on as long, or longer as any gloss I have tried.  This color Hallucination is very pretty, but it is also much lighter than I expected it to be.  I thought it would be more like Shimmer (which is my favorite, and I'm worried they discontinued).  If you want a little bit of pretty color, this is nice and it's also great over a lip stick or mixed with a more colorful gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gets me compliments and stays on for 3+ hours. It also leaves my lips feeling soft and hydrated even when it wears off!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The photos make it look like this product would make your lips super juicy and glossy but I don't get that when I put this on. I get a light layer of shimmer and my lips look kind of wet, that's it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t last very long. I would consider it more of a really gloss lip oil.  It’s not my favorite.

reviews.review_title: Just like I remember, love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A classic, I loved these growing up and still love them now! Such a nostalgic smell. It's thicker which adds to its staying power (if you don't like a thicker, somewhat stickier gloss then it may not be for you) Beautiful shine. Also: milky pink gloss + Melt cosmetics lip liner in nudist. Such. A. Gorgeous. Combo. Thank me later.

reviews.review_title: bought it for the hype, but that’s all it is
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought it on sale for $12 so I can see what the rave is about this “IT” lipgloss from the y2k that I never had, but honestly my hair gets stuck to my lips, it doesn’t taste as good as I thought it would, it’s thick but not too glossy and overall too hyped up :/ will still use it obviously, not tossing my money but there’s so many better cheaper glosses imo

reviews.review_title: Pretty and long lasting but sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the color of this lip gloss. It was surprisingly opaque and long lasting but it was also very sticky. I got this on National Lipstick Day for half off and I wouldn’t pay full price for it. There are so many other tube lip glosses that feel much better and look just as good for less than half the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These remind me so much of my childhood! These were soooo popular circa 2004-2005. Even the smell reminds me of childhood! Very fruity and fun be simple! I’m so glad they still make these glosses! Taste great, very simple with color, hydrating and smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not what expected at all It’s look ok but nothing like the pic. The pictures make it look as if they are very glossy and thin but, they are very thick and sticky. In order to get that much gloss, you have to put a lot on, and it will be incredibly sticky  But, it’s still looks ok… just not what expected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These juicy tubes from Lancome is everything, definitely a must have. I have the pure and spring fling flavors. My lips are super hydrated and moisturised when I use this product, my lips are constantly soft and moist. These are my current must haves.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazingly applause love the color love how pigmented it is and how beautiful it looks on brown skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!!! instantly became obsessed with it, became my go to everyday lipgloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s really sticky , feels like stick glue on the lip but it’s a great colour :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this gloss. It’s less sticky than the other  juicy tubes but it does stay on. It has a bit of Color - like a strawberry copper Color and sparkles. It plumps your lips too but doesn’t sting.

I don’t get how this is so highly rated? First of all the applicator is terrible. I hate anything with a squeeze tube because it’s just messy and I always squeeze out too much product. It’s also inconvenient, because my lip gloss separated in the tube and since it’s a squeeze tube there really isn’t any way to mix it. In terms of the formula, it’s okay, but that’s about it. It’s pretty glossy, but also decently thick and sticky. It’s nice, but nothing special, and definitely not worth the price tag.

reviews.review_title: Sticky and Thick-Its an okay lip gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just received this lip gloss today! I found it to be sticky and thick texture which I understand some lip glosses can be but for me it wasn’t really it. I would’ve preferred it being not so sticky at least. I would really give this review a 3.5-4 mostly cause its a cute lip gloss and its glossy and has that lip gloss smell that reminds you of store bought glosses, if that makes sense which isnt bad cause it smells nice. Otherwise its just thick and sticky feeling but ill still use it since it does moisturize my lips so far. I probably wouldn’t recommend it but thats just me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sticky, thick gloss with a luxurious feel. Smells delicious

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Hydration and shine! I swear this stuff plumps your lips or at least makes them look plumped.

reviews.review_title: feels & tastes like cheap lipgloss from Claire's
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got it in a gift set or else I'd return it. It's sticky, it smells like children's makeup, and it's definitely not worth 24 dollars. Even the packaging is cheap. Maybe I got an expired one or a dud because I can't see this getting positive reviews.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancôme - Birthday Confetti is a smooth application. The gloss in this tube is clear, and light. The appearance of the color has a subtle sheet confetti sparkle on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is absolutely perfect! It lasts a long time and is a lovely glossy pink shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love these! I fell in love with them as a teenager, 13 years ago and they are still amazing! Beautiful colours & they stay on for several hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. it feels so creamy and moisturizing and is so comfortable. It also smells so good and sweet like candy but not overbearing at all. I definitely want every shade! So cute definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Olive skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this specifically for the pinks and the nude shade but come to find out the nude is actually red in person. Lancôme really needs to update their images cause their inaccurate pictures isn’t new

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beware! The Golden color is not in this set, as shown in pictures. Instead, a reddish color called farmhouse is in the set. So disappointed! I don't use reds. I was excited to order this because of the color hallucination, but oh well!

reviews.review_title: One color switched for a red one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not too happy. One of the colors showed, hallucination, did not arrive. Instead I got Framboise pop which is kind of red, and I do NOT use red or dark colors. So not what I wanted!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! The gloss is sticky but it’s long lasting and has such great shine! The shimmer and glitter really bring back those early 00’s feels. The only reason why I didn’t give five stars is because I also received a bright red instead of the champagne color. This was a bummer because I was very excited for the champagne color but the red color is very nice nonetheless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The flavor is so good. Reminds me of a watermelon jolly rancher! Keeps my lips hydrated for about 2-3 hours before needed re-applied, if I’m not eating or wearing a mouth covering face mask.

What is displayed on the website is incorrect. The champangish color is not actually included and instead is a bery red, with a totally different name. I even had them send a new one, same problem sadly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I totally forgot how much I love this product! Don’t let the plastic tube packaging fool you, as this is a luxurious and non-sticky formula. I used to use these all the time as a young teen, but trying it again in my 20s makes me fall in love with this again! Smells like bubble gum.

reviews.review_title: The best lush lip gloss!! Excellent presents.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best lush lip gloss. I love Lancôme’s products to begin with. My mom gave me a sheer gloss and I’ve always used it as a moisturizer before bed (before lip masks popularized), the plump effect works (via moisturize/hydration).   The lipgloss itself takes 1 year to finish for me. It is a bit sticky (in a nice way), glossy, silky, and had a white sparkle to them, making the lips shine. The shine lasts a bit longer ~30-1hr which is nice. The colors are very sheer so I sometimes use these as a topper. These are favorite gifts to get. Smells neutral and nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great gift & love the texture, colors and smell of these lipglosses!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! Color pops, “juicy” moisturized lips all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Moisturizing and long-lasting, but the incredible stickiness is a total no-go for me. Especially when I don a mask and end up with sticky on the mask and fuzz on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a phenomenal deal for anyone who loves Juicy Tubes. It’s my absolute favorite gloss, I’ve loved these and used them for almost 20 years! The set was an absolute no brainer purchase. Three amazing shades and they’re all full size! Just do it already! Lip gloss doesn’t get better than this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my favorite lipgloss! It last for hours! It’s a little sticky but I can endure it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glossy. I like the formula. Doesn't last long though. But I got it on clearance so it was worth it for what I paid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best lip-gloss ever. I personally love the taste of the shade marshmallow electro, it tastes like marshmallows. It is the perfect amount of glitter and naturalness and I wear it 27/7 and it works as a lip balm too! the only fall back is it is a tad bit sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: More like a lip balm rather a lipgloss. If you buy it as a lipgloss, i am not recommend it, it’s really sticky. I use it as lip balm and I love it. The sent is amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this lip gloss as a gift with purchase. The color is beautiful. However, the gloss is unusable because of its tacky texture. You will have hair, crumbs (you cannot wipe it off with a towel or a napkin, you need to wash the thing off), and such stuck to your lips. Furthermore, it is not hydrating at all. Unsure what the function of the product but it I would not spend money on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: LANCÔME UNDERSTOOD THE ASSIGNMENT!!!!!! I never play about my gloss. Probably the best gloss on the market. It’s thick, smells AMAZING, last for a long time. I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a decent lip gloss; it stays on well because of the thicker texture and it’s pretty. But it’s only decent, the packaging is cheap, and it has a cheap, early 2000’s lip smacker waxy scent. I got mine on sale for $8 at my store and I think that’s about what they’re worth, I certainly wouldn’t pay $20 for this gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Another hyped-up product that I tried once. Sticky. There's a nice taste to it, but that's it. Sticky is its main characteristic. I don't know why people like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a Sephora favorites sample set. It has a really pretty pink color with gorgeous sparkle. BUT it’s sticky. VERY STICKY lipgloss so I won’t use it. It’s sad that it’s such an amazing color and shine but has a sticky formula that makes it not appealing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG I LOVE THIS TUBE OF GOODNESS. the color pops but not garish and it keeps me looking pulled together even as it fades. And it takes hours to fully disappear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my all-time favorite lip glosses.  I'm so glad that it is here on Sephora again.  I have been a fan for many years of the clear glosses with tints.  I haven't tried the ones with tiny shimmery glitter particles, so I can't speak to those.  These glosses are thick and protect my dry lips.  They have a high shine finish.  I highly recommend these to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in a Sephora Hello bag, and even though I always try to find a use for everything, I'm throwing this away. It's extremely thick, sticky, gritty (because of the glitter), glittery enough to look ridiculous on someone in their 30s, and slightly sweet. Unlike Buxom (which I love), it has no plumping effect. Its only redeeming quality is that the applicator is appropriate to the consistency of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a trial size of the shade Marshmallow Electro in a recent “Sephora Favorites.” It was thick, sticky and glittery.  It reminded me much of little girl play lip gloss. This is disappointing because I do like other products from Lancôme. I will not be purchasing the full sized product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t get the good reviews, because this is my least favorite gloss. It’s very thick and sticky, and yet doesn’t last that long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a sample size in one of Sephora’s favorites sets and it is just awful. I’m not sure how this got such high ratings. However, there are some conflicting reviews and mentions of a new formula. Some say theirs is thin and oily but mine is THICK and sticky. I took it off immediately. I wasn’t a fan of the smell either. This was not a winner for me. It looks nice, that’s about it. I always return to Bite’s Agave+ Nighttime Therapy (I wear it all day) and it is dreamy. At $20 a pop for each, Bite is well worth the high price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I DREAMED of owning a JT as a middle schooler. I took a quick swipe of a sample tube in 2003 and fell in love. I couldn't afford one. And my mom doesn't wear makeup, so she just wouldn't understand.  I'm an adult and can buy as many as I want now to make up for lost time. Tickled Pink is my favorite. It's mlbb (my lips but better). Smells like roses and watermelon. Love the thick texture.  Only bad part is it separates and gets liquidy and gross if you don't use it regularly. I store mine upside down to combat that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i wasnt much on glosses until i got this. its so hydrating and last long with out coming off. it is not sticky. it is a must have.
I bought this in Miracle and Framboise Pop, it's really nice and shiny. Moisturizes well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I’d ALWAYS wanted to try one of these glosses, but growing up I could never afford them. I was so bummed when they were discontinued! When they were brought back, I saw mixed reviews, most of them negative, but as with all products, I have to make my own judgement. I bought the shade “marshmallow electro” and I was NOT disappointed! The formula wasn’t at all sticky, despite what others had said. The glitter is SO perfect for me! I don’t wear heavy makeup any longer so I usually stick to no makeup besides filling in my brows and lash extensions, but I LOVE a glossy lip! This is the best addition to my lippie collection! So glad I purchased it. I will be repurchasing for certain, as well as other shades! Well done, Lancôme!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These juicy tubes need way more attention!  They make my lips so glossy glassy and plump.  Don't be afraid to buy the red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not normally a lip gloss gal but this is amazing. The formula is so soft and plumps the lips. It’s also less sticky than normal lip glosses. This will definitely become a part of my daily makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These r so sticky. I had to throw my glass cup away after taking a sip w this gloss on bc nothing would take the gloss residue off. I even tried bleach. Not worth it, there’s better out there. Lancôme has been falling off lately.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It’s perfect for on the go or if I want to hydrate my lips while I sleep overnight. No more cracked lips!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is literally the most amazing gloss. the shimmer is so great and the gloss does not come off very easily. this is a perfect gloss to go any lipliner or matte lipstick. it does get a little bit sticky after a little bit, but it's honestly not a big deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love juice tubes lip gloss. It's always been my favorite because it is sticky and it lasts longer than most lip glosses. It also gives off a nice shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my favorite lip glosses! It’s perfectly thick and really moisturizes. It gives a nice shine but be careful, if you put too much, your lips will be a little too shiny. One tube lasts a good while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color. Love the feel. Great product  not sticky at all!  Lasts good bit too

reviews.review_title: Best Lip Gloss of All Time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I’ve heard that juicy tubes was back on the market, my teenage self was totally jumping for joy. So when I was visiting Sephora (my 1st visit since the pandemic), I became indecisive about what I wanted to purchase and when I came across the Lancôme display, Juicy Tubes have stolen my heart just like when I was in middle school and I was reborn that day!  Juicy tubes forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think they changed not only the shades, but the shine. It’s sticky but balmy at the same time, but not very shiny. Fenty has more shine, for example. I’m glad I only bought one for the nostalgia.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brings me back to 2006. I have to say that if you loved the look of juicy crazy wet-looking lips you need this in your life. These of course are very sticky which is to be expected and will get in your hair, but if you like that juicy pout look from the movie mean girls, this one is for you. I used to own these in every color and would layer these on like crazy. These are so much fun and bring me back. I'm probably going to on every shade in the next year or two. And I actually have an old/half-empty juicy tube from 2006 that I found in a drawer and it still smells good and I used it without issue. Highly recommend every color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is terrible.  It's very thin - almost oily - disappears within 30 min, and has an awful smell/taste. I will not buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss has a thick texture which I like bc it means its going to last. The sparkles are fun & not gritty, and the application is smooth. The only downside is that is has an odd sunscreen, bitter yet overly sweet sugar scent? I found it odd but the scent fades in a few min anyway so I still use it. I would recommend if scent doesn't bother you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is really pigmented and has amazing shine, only thing I would be aware of would be the stickiness of it. The applicator is amazing and smooth. I do recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Just like I remember - super thick, super sticky, stays on forever. If you don't like sticky lip gloss, you'll hate it. Cherry has a nice subtle tint to it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i love the shade i got and how creamy the gloss is it fills in lines and ur lips look juicy and pouty with a nice tint

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So a friend got me a set of Juicy Tubes for my birthday, and I'm going to review this shade because it was by far my favorite shade in the set. I haven't used Juicy Tubes lip gloss since middle school, so it was kind of nostalgic to see the iconic plastic tube again!  Since the shade Magic Spell looks really pink in the tube, I was scared that it would be a really childish color on my lips, but when I applied it, it actually just provided a subtle, soft pink tint on my lips! There's a sheer glitter in it, which is really nice when the light hits it.   Another thing that's really nice about this lip gloss is that it's not heavy or sticky - it's fairly lightweight and my lips don't feel gross when I apply it. It's not as lightweight as my favorite lip gloss (Glossier's lip gloss), but it's pretty darn close.  Also, $20 may seem expensive for a lip gloss, but each tube is 0.5 oz., which is a lot more than most other lip glosses will give you. Glossier charges $14 for just 0.14 oz. of lip gloss, so this Lancome lip gloss is actually only a bit more expensive than Glossier's lip gloss with over three times the product. That's a really good value!   I kind of wish that Lancome would update its lip gloss packaging to look more aesthetically pleasing, but there is something to be said about the feeling of nostalgia that this product's packaging fosters.   Overall, I think that this is a great lip gloss! I didn't have super high expectations before trying this product again after a lot of years, since I really didn't trust my makeup taste in middle school, but this product definitely exceeded my expectations by a lot! I'd literally still wear this lip gloss; it's not just a little kid lip gloss, even though a lot of us did use it when we were little kids. I personally still like Glossier's lip gloss better, but this is definitely a better value and there are so many different shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Go to product for a subtle color for the lips. This also doesn’t feel overly sticky like most glosses. It has an almost smooth, lightweight feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how juicy my lips are! Definitely an impulse buy I don’t regret!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first purchased this on October 6th 2020. I was obsessed! Honestly the best primer and hydrating lip gloss I have ever found (and I have tired A TON). However when I repurchased this on November 11th 2020 the formula was completely different. It was not as thick as my first purchase and this version is very runny. I would not have bought this product if I knew the formula would not be consistent.  Now, it is not as hydrating and did not last as long as the first product I purchased in October. Very disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't used this in years but went back to it recently and I'm so happy I did! It was even shinier than I remember and had staying power. It even made my lips look plumper!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this tube today and tried it for the first time. It feels thick going on but it is not a thick wearing formula in the least. It’s a very comfortable consistency formula that doesn’t stray outside your lip lines either. Stays super glossy even with drinking water bottles etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i received this as a delux sample and i really love it. it is thick, but not sticky in my opinion. the color is beautiful and glossy for sure. the scent is that of watermelons. i am pleased with my pick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: Sticky, sticky, sticky. Do not recommend. Made the mistake and had to get exchange.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. It has a lot of color and glitter and really makes your lips shine! It also tastes really good (but please don’t consume the whole tube!). My only complaint is about the packaging. It’s Lancôme, shouldn’t it be a little fancier? It reminds me of a lip gloss tube you could get at Claire’s. The formula doesn’t reflect cheapness at all, but it’s just my opinion on packaging. However, I think it’s a good deal since packaging usually increases the price of makeup. I highly recommend if you want a luxury good with some magic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a gloss that tastes good, after using some that don't taste so good. This smells sweet, and actually tastes sweet too! I tried finding information on the taste before buying as I was looking at several different brands online, and I couldn't find any info on how Juicy Tubes taste, so hopefully this will help others that are searching for the same thing. I don't know if all colors smell and taste the same or if they are all different.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: First off , A+ on the packaging! I accidentally dried my Lancôme juicy tube in the dryer and it did NOT explode on my clothes or get warped or anything . Shade is more pink than a dusty rose on me . I must have came across the juicy tubes when I was a kid because the scent and the product in my hands took me back. Overall, the deluxe sample I got made me want to buy the full size . Would recommend if you like glosses and don’t mind a more messy application.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for minimal makeup look, thick & glossy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had Dreamsicle in high school and now have Spring Fling, which is more clear and glossy and I LOVE it! it's a nostalgia piece that feels thick and is so shiny. The scent is sweet. Usually I just line my lips with lipliner and then use a vaseline tin but I dislike using my fingers for application so this tube is perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color with just the right amount of stickiness and sparkle. It smells so good and looks amazing. Super long lasting for a gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gives you a somewhat shine  if you put a lot on , but the glitter inside seems like it sits and dry up on lip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Good but not enough for a balm. Get if want shine and gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved juicy tubes back in the day and I was SO excited to see them return! If you’re new to this gloss be aware that this is a thick, sticky, super shiny gloss. If you’re familiar with MUFE plexigloss it’s a similar deal. What that means is this is a long wearing gloss that your lips won’t really absorb, and it’s not hydrating. You either love it or you hate it! This color is a very sheer bright red tint. Mostly clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When Lancome brought the Juicy Tubes back, I had to get them again.  The scent and formula brought me right back to high school circa 2002 ;) I thought they might have changed the formula (maybe they have a little?) but it smelled and felt pretty much the same -- which is OK, but they are VERY sticky/tacky and thick.  Still love it, though. Took off one star because the tackiness does get a little annoying. Color payoff is also pretty minimal, but I feel like that is to be expected in a lip gloss.  They all look very similar on, I think.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great but this is just clear gloss. I remember buying this product a long time ago and I felt the orange had more pigment. I know I just wanted this for the nostalgiabut it also doesn’t have the same smell and taste. Still a great thick formula

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells like strawberry jam! It brings me right back to visiting Gma and Gpa and they'd make me oatmeal with homemade jam on it. Color is sheer, sparkly berry. Staying power is great since it's a JT.  Makes my lips feel as moisturized as my Laneige Lip Mask which is crazy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I thought for the price these lip glosses will really POP. its typical and if you can go to your local beauty supply store and get you a couple of them for 20 bucks just go its okay. Paying for the brand name really.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've always liked Lancome as a brand. This Juicy Tubes lip gloss is a great gloss to layer on your favorite lip stick. It's a bit tacky in finish, but I kind of expected this from most lip glosses. It has a sweet scent, which may not be a good option for those sensitive to scents. I love the delicious scent of Hallucination, it's almost like a bubble gum scent. Overall, I would recommend this to friends as I love its hydrating benefits and shiny finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this gloss thinking it was going to be smooth and thick, but unfortunately wasn't. Upon the first application an oily substance came out of the tube. The oils also separate in the tube as well. After a few uses the gloss became a thicker consistency which I loved. The downside is that it gives my lips a tingle and the glitters feel gritty. I find myself reapplying every 20 min. I feel as if I may just have gotten a dud, but I would try another juicy tube in a non sparkly texture:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's a very beautiful lip gloss. haven't used it much yet since I'm stuck in the house, but will be seeing how moisturizing it is during the winter.   only con is that the price point is a lot for what you get, so be careful with how much you use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is just way too sticky. I love a good gloss but it shouldn’t feel heavy and gooey on my lips.
I have a lot of these glosses and this is a nice set.    The tubes are small....not like full size,   The colors are nice and I especially like the red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this as a Beauty Insider reward and I ain't mad at it. It is not overly sticky, dries quick, lasts, and gives the lip a nice juicy effect. The glitter adds a touch of appropiate sparkle that is appropriate for grown folk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m not somebody who is really picky with glosses, but the other reviews for this product have been confusing to me, and I do have some personal problems with this gloss, so I thought I would give my 2 cents lol First off, I would not describe this gloss as sticky whatsoever. This seems to be an issue with some people, others don’t mind it. Thicker, sticky glosses typically wear longer throughout the day, so I prefer them. This gloss feels more like an oil to me, which I do not like. It’s very thin on the lips, and it does not wear very long at all. I feel like I have to keep applying it to have any shine. Second, the glitter is DEFINITELY gritty. Again, this isn’t something bothers me all the time. But the problem I have with this glitter is it is very gritty, but it doesn’t look like it applies. So you feel the glitter, but you can’t really see it. So again, I feel like I have to keep applying it or use a lot of product at once. It’s essentially just a clear gloss with grit. Last, the color is misleading online. Like others have said about Birthday Confetti, they describe it as sheer pink and show it as a sheer pink, but it’s clear in real life. There is no pink in the gloss whatsoever. I was excited when my store finally got these in. They only received one and I purchased it, and I was very disappointed. I’m not sure how the other shades look or feel. I’m sure the glosses without glitter are better on the lips, but this one was a letdown.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly super hydrating for a lip gloss- normally I need chap sticks/lip masks to leave my lips feeling soft and smooth, but this does an amazing job, smells nice, & stays on for hours! I purchased framboise pop.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am totally in love with it, the sparkles are really thin and beautiful and it gives a nice color to your lips,

reviews.review_title: Don't get it inside your mouth.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: it is super thick and any loose hair will stick to it.   Marshmallow electro is pretty much a super sheer shimmery pink. The glitter flecks aren’t gritty and easily wipe off without traveling outside my lips or resurfacing later in my pores glinting back at me in the mirror.    The thing that turns me off the most is the odd taste and texture it has. Naturally, you lick your lips and gloss travels into your mouth. When it does, it is just an odd unpleasant experience. The thickness remains and it just kind of lingers on your tongue for a while. Other glosses do not do this. You just ingest it, and it is like it never happened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this gloss! It’s great all year long but it’s perfect for winter because of how thick and hydrating it is. The color keeps me from looking pale/washed out and it protects my lips from the cold. It also has a light cherry scent which is wonderful. The only issue I have with it is that it is a bit sticky, which isn’t a problem as long as I tie my hair back in windy weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My love for this product is 50/50 nostalgia & appreciation for a gloss that moisturizes like the rock star it is.  Fair note though, it is super thick and any loose hair will stick to it but it’s one of my gold standard   products for dry lips for a reason. All the shades I’ve tried smelly yummy but I’ve never had any adverse reactions which is a rare event for me and scented things.  Marshmallow electro is pretty much a super sheer shimmery pink. The glitter flecks aren’t gritty and easily wipe off without traveling outside my lips or resurfacing later in my pores glinting back at me in the mirror.  Just pure win all around. Trying to decide which shade to snag next.

reviews.review_title: don’t let the packaging fool you this is LUXURIOUS
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: PERFECT on the go lipgloss, easy to apply, smells amazing, cute but classy packaging, bigger than it looks in the picture, goes with any outfit, locks onto lips cozily, perfect for dry lips. I will be purchasing more :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These lip glosses are lovely, the tickled pink one smells like watermelon to me and is nice a moisturizing on the lips, not super sticky like alot of other lip glosses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. Brings back memories of old school lipgloss.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Too sticky for me. An extremely thick formula...not impressed, it tends to look messy on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Always have loved Juicy Tubes. They have the longest wearing power. Can be applied lightly and still literally lasts for hours. This color is amazing, too. Goes on a nice sheer medium pink. Perfect shade in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is it. This is the perfect lip gloss. Not sticky, super moisturizing and lasts for hours! Love my glossssyy lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally worth the money  It last for almost 4 hours straight, and lately with the facemask situation it works pretty well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this today. Highly disappointed with this product. It is very sticky and heavy on my lips. It is not glossy that I had in my mind. I do not recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thick but not to thick and a whole lot of shine! This has been my favorite gloss for so long I love all the colors. Just buy it you will not regret it. And they last forever! Nothing compares.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: it's sticky and glossy like it's supposed to be, but the smell isn't kind, nor is the color how it shows in the photo. Minimal glitter and tint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this one because this was my first Juicy Tube I purchased and it's the same! I was so excited. The lip gloass is just that though, it's just gloss and still very sticky. I've graduated to lipstick and love it so much, but during this quarantine, I've been going the minimal makeup route so this gloss is perfect for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do like the color and shine, but it's just waaaaaaaay too sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I really love the formula, a super glossy look is able to be achieved with only a little product. I love the way the birthday confetti smells, just like birthday cake! The reason I’m only giving 3 stars is because the color description of birthday confetti is very misleading. Online it is described as sheer pearl pink with confetti sparkle and in the picture it is shown as pink in the tube. Upon opening the box when I got it in the mail, it’s not pink, but totally clear with that confetti sparkle. Still very pretty but not at all what I expected, would work great as a topper in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a mini of this and it’s just so sticky. I don’t think it’s worth the price even though it is nice. Other than the stickiness it is a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancôme Juicy Tubes... they're a classic. Subtle and moisturizing. Personally I really like the squeeze tube since they aren't very opaque. It makes them quick and easy to apply. Good for on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! Not to sticky. It looks glittery in the tube which I thought would look juvenile but it goes on looking like a normal wet gloss.  05 has a light color that adds that little something extra to make you look pulled together when you don’t want to do full lips or you want to go makeup free

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample with my order and fell in love! So mad I wasted my money on the Lenaige lip mask on a previous order. That stuff is just hype...This is far more superior and actually looks great! I typically wear in the evenings after washing my face while getting ready for bed, but I think I’d wear on a natural makeup day when leaving the house! Buying Hallucination next!

reviews.review_title: Looks Pretty, But Texture Is Not Ideal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss looked really pretty in the tube, but it went on super sticky and with a sort of granular feel to the sparkles. I was not a fan of the texture or the strong scent. There are better glosses out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this! It looks amazing and it reminds me of the 90’s again. In love! Will be buying more!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So so pretty! It’s not sticky, it’s tacky but it lasts for hours and provides a very light tint with a nice sparkle and sheen. It’s super hydrating as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I got was too sparkly for me. The formula is kinda of sticky and it has pretty strong sweet smell that makes me a little nauseous. It wasn’t the worst lip gloss m, but I have had better ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm in love with this gloss...a little goes a very long way, its a little sticky at first but once it sinks in to my lips they look so naturally moisturized and had such a pleasant, yummy scent and taste. I prefer a natural look 95% of the time, with the exception of special occasions and this color did it perfectly and I didn't have to keep reapplying!

reviews.review_title: Lifesaver if you have extremely dry, chapped lips!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a phenomenal lipgloss if you have extra chapped lips that need protection. I’m currently on accutane and while other glosses sounds keep my lips comfortable, the heavier “sticky” texture actually works best at locking in moisture, even when wearing a mask or in central A/C. I typically only have to reapply once or twice a day after meals. This works way better than the petroleum jelly derms recommend to protect your lips. I got a sample size of this in the Discovery set and was astounded to find it became my new “old” favorite. I definitely had one of these back in my teen years and the formula has improved since then — the balance is way better so the gloss isn’t as sticky, though it’s heavier than other contemporary products.  If you don’t want a shimmer or colored gloss, I think going for the clear is a solid option for phenomenal dry lip protection. I’ll be repurchasing as long as I’m on accutane.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty color, but way too sticky! had to wash it off because I could not stand it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE THIS GLOSS GOT IT AS A TRIAL SIZE NOW I NEED TO BUY FULL SIZE ! I’M ALSO IN LOVE WITH 5 OTHER SHADES BESIDES THIS ONE,  IT IS STICKY ONCE YOU APPLY BUT I SEEMS TO GO SORT OF GO AWAY AFTER A WHILE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so happy they brought these back!  Hallucination, is my all time fav! I mix it with my other lippies and wear it alone......it’s lovely on.  Peace

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a big fan of the juicy tubes when they came out it mustve been about 2004? maybe 2003 they were always sticky/tacky but were super pretty I used to own rapsberry ice? and spring fling this reminded me somewhat of that light pink shade spring fling but with shimmer. If your lips are not darker naturally this may not be your shade but it does have staying power and it is still pretty smells like candy. the scent maybe should be more universal like a champagne or citrus...and it would make the product more appealing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I wondered if it would smell like marshmallows, since that is in the name, but it didn't (and I really wanted it to). I do love the lip gloss for staying power, shine and feel (it doesn't feel sticky or tacky to me). I have light skin but still couldn't detect any pigment when I put it on (it seemed clear to me). That's okay too, but I wanted to mention it. This is the perfect gloss to put on top of a matte lipstick. I received a free sample along with my Sephora order.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So. In. Love. I buy and wear lip gloss like no ones business. Every new lip gloss I try! And this is it! Doesn’t give you that weird buildup on the inside of your lip. Smells AMAZING!! like frosting! And the glitter isn’t too much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have no issue with “sticky” lip glosses.  They do not dry out your lips, something is still there moisturizing even when the color is gone.  I had forgotten how good these were! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: SO GOOD! My mom loves this lip gloss and couldn’t find it anywhere for the longest time but luckily its back! She loves the colour and can’t find any other product that matches the colour or the creamy moisturizing formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best gloss ever. It is super moisturizing and stays on a long time. I can apply this before a 12 hour shift as a nurse and it keeps my lips hydrated in a dry environment. I also put it on before bed and it lasts all night. I am a gloss junkie and have tried everything. I’m so thankful they brought it back with such beautiful new colors! If you are looking for something you have to reapply all the time, this isn’t for you. If you want something that looks good, keeps your lips hydrated, and lasts a long time, you have found your match.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like it only for the fact it is nostalgic. It reminds me of something I would wear when I was 10. For the price and being a Lancôme product, It is very sticky, which reminds me of a gloss I would get at a drug store. Also way too glittery not a flattering gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Way too glittery. Also made my lips sting. Very disappointed. Reminded me of something I would have worn as a 12 year old.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample and as soon as I put it on my lips to swipe it was a sticky,  tacky feeling. I was so disappointed because I love glosses and I really wanted to love this.  it has great reviews.  but for me,  this is a definite NO.

reviews.review_title: so nostalgic! (super sticky and too sweet)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: legit hadnt thought about these until i saw my friend looking at an ad from sephora and i shouted spring fling was my everything then she told me they were coming back!  Its just like i remembered!! its fun to see the 5 stars from everyone that used it back in the day and the 1+2 stars that didnt know what sticky goopy sugar middle school pop situation they were getting themselves into!

reviews.review_title: Like your favorite childhood gloss but wayyy bette
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Don’t get all the bad reviews for this, it’s not any more sticky than any other lip gloss I’ve tried. It stays in place and the sparkly is so pretty and subtle. Like a grown up version of your childhood favorite. No strong smell. And makes your lips POP. I have marshmallow electro and one more and I love them both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a classic! Looks glassy on the lips. I got the birthday confetti and it’s suppose to have a pink tint to it, but mines literally clear with glitter in it...still super pretty though. The taste of the gloss is horrible though lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I disagree with the reviewers claiming they are “sticky”. When we say sticky, it definitely has a negative connotation to it when we use that word in describing a lip gloss. What perhaps is more accurate is saying that this gloss is tacky. It does *not* pull those weird gross stringy strands at the ends of your lips like I imagine when someone tells me that a lipgloss is “sticky”. This isn’t that. It feels and wears like a high-end lip gloss. Comparisons to drugstore lipglosses in some reviews I find wild! And not in a good way. Buy the gloss, they fly off the shelves in my Sephora store. Juicy tubes are a rich gloss that hugs your coats your lips evenly, and lasts quite a bit longer than other glosses because of its trademark texture. The actual colours are fairly transparent so keep that in mind when you build your expectations. They also don’t really have a specific smell to me, they just smell kinda sweet. But not like a headache inducing-I’m-using-my-4-year-old’s-cheap-gloss kinda way. If you love the look of the rich glossy 90’s lip trend then you will adore these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never used the original so I can’t compare this to that, but I got a freebie size of the Marshmallow Electro and it is nasty. I almost bought the full size and I’m so glad I didn’t spend 20 bucks on it. The smell isn’t overpowering but what you do smell smells like cheap plasticky kid lip gloss kind of, almost a chemically strawberry/vanilla smell, and if you accidentally taste it which I don’t do on purpose, it tastes very bitter and chemically, its so gross. Ok so it’s clear, glossy, and shiny but so are a whole bunch of other glosses. THIS was a cult favorite?!? There’s no way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For a $20 lipgloss, it's not that impressive. It's thick and sticky. I can get the same effect from a lipgloss from Walmart for $5.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so happy Lancome brought back Juicy Tubes! Best of all, it's even better than I remember from childhood. I got marshmallow electro, which is sheer pinkish color. I honestly considered knocking off a star, because the pink color payoff is nonexistent, but the rose gold shimmer is there. This is a thick, sticky, high-shine gloss with a light vanilla scent and flavor. Staying power is great. I applied it once and my lips stayed glossy for about an hour. I'll probably order some more colors down the line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this quite quickly, so that accounts for one star. However, the gloss I received is a clear/white base with some glitter embedded in it. I quickly checked to see if it was Birthday Confetti (it is). Ugh. So disappointed as I was expecting a glittery, pink confection not...this. I did try it out and it's okay. There is a hint of sparkle and it smells a bit like coconut/vanilla. Also, it lasts quite a while. One star for these pros. Just beware that you could end up with a dud like I did!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was ok, the color was good, but the texture was a bit sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love this color. This lipgloss definitely takes me back to my childhood, Lancôme was my first lipgloss, so happy to have it back in my life! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like a teenager again in the best possible way. Glossy and it tastes great and has a nice hint of color. Not too sticky. It’s not long lasting, but it’s a gloss.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color on lip is not as pretty as it looks on the tube or on the picture. quite sticky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always loved Juicy Tubes! So thankful they are back. They stay on and moisturize very well!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! Provides long-lasting moisture & shine. A bit pricey but accomplishes its goal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I feel like I am in middle school again - 90s gloss queen supreme! So happy it is back - forgot how much I love a tube gloss for throwing in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The BEST gloss ever! Major nostalgia...Reminds me of my early 20's! This gloss is thick, but stays in place and makes my pout look thick. The scent is fantastic, just the way I remember and actually hydrating. PLEASE do not discontinue this product EVER!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to relive my junior high years and try the birthday confetti shade out. It still has the same sticky gloss that I remember and love. The only disappointment I have is in the description it says it's a pale pink shade and mine is clear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Lancôme Juicy Tubes lip gloss in Hallucination. I love how the shade is not overpowering and it leaves behind a beautiful color. I love how the lip gloss does not leave a sticky feeling behind. The color and shine lasts for hours. My lips are super hydrated thanks to the Vitamin E. I love the variety there are 10 shades to choose from. This is one of my favorite lip glosses. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I adore Juicy Tubes! I’m someone who actually loves sticky lip gloss (I swear the stickier it is the longer it lasts) and Ticked Pink has been my signature daily-wear color for the last 3-4 years.   I ordered a new tube last week and... I’m so disappointed... the color has really changed and it’s WAY more pink than it used to be. It’s described as “dusty rose” which suited the original formula. The original was more neutral and sophisticated, now it’s far too “rosey” for me (I’m not a pink gal... it makes me look like a child)  Please bring back the OG Tickled Pink Lancôme!  So 3 stars because it’s still a quality gloss, just not fond of the new color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I’ve been looking for!! A thicker gloss that isn’t sticky and last a long time. It’s pretty heavy but I personally like it like that. It’s not one of those glosses that disappears after a few mins. It’s hydrating and doesn’t dry out my lips. There is a smell to the gloss but it isn’t off putting and it tastes slightly sweet almost like nothing. The color is this sheer reddish pink and is amazing. I will be getting more in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color and texture.  Love the throw back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I expected this to be a little more pink.  It didn't look good on me, so I returned it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These juicy tubes were huge ten years ago, and came in many colours and flavours. Personally, I find the texture a little bit different from before. They used to be thicker and stickier but this is now one of my favourite glosses since they’ve been back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to cry when it seemed they were no longer making these lip glosses. They are THE BEST glosses on the market! Thick and glossy. Lasts hours and hours. SUPER shine. I am SOOO glad they are back. I need all the colors immediately!

reviews.review_title: Almost like the original - the new scent is awful
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color and texture is excellent. I also ordered Spring Fling and the color matches exactly! I still have some of the original to compare.  Unfortunately the fragrance is different. The actual originals have a light, slightly fruity scent that is 'juicy'. The new version has a strong synthetic vanilla / plastic smell.  I've noticed that many lipsticks and glosses have this scent lately.  I'm sensitive to scent, especially synthetic fragrance and this one gives me a headache and bit of nausea.  If I could tolerate the smell I'd give it five stars.  I'm disappointed that Lancome could not deliver on its promise of actually bringing back the Original Juicy Tubes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so in love I remember purchasing this when I was 16 years old it was one of my first lip gloss I got to purchase so happy that they're the same

reviews.review_title: They are BACK and i am THRILLED!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have adored these since they first came out, even buying them in Europe as they had my favorite color, Lychee, in stock. Am thrilled to see them back. Staying power galore, beautiful colors. thank you Lancome!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So when I got this I was immediately displeased with the smell, just a very strong chemically almost old cosmetics vibe. The gloss is basically just clear and it was shiny so I was kind of ok with it and just kept it because I have to return by mail. Fast forward about a month and I pick it up to use and it smells completely different. Like straight up chemicals, and has a very chemically bitter taste and looks less pink in the tube. I ended up throwing something I used twice in the trash which sucks. The same thing happened with the birthday one. It smells better, guess they all have different scents, and the glitter is really pretty. But when you open the box it has a pinky tinge to it in the tube and in one month it has become clear and smells different. Why are they deteriorating so rapidly? Btw the doors always open so it’s not like my bathroom stays humid and there is no window for sunlight to ruin them. They’re kept in a covered tray anyways. Such a waste of $40.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super thick! Doesn’t spread very easily. Also, glitter or something in the gloss made my lips BURN! I wore it for about 2 seconds and had to wipe it off. So disappointed. Packaging is SO CUTE though!!!

reviews.review_title: I usually use Mac this is better
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you like a thick gloss this is for you. This product has incredible staying power. I have a dark complexion and this shade was sheer with a sidle sparkle that was so pretty on my lips. Good for a clean look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a pretty gloss! It's very comfortable and keeps my lips moisturized, and doesn't get all gross and dry in the creases of your lips like many glosses do. Only 4 stars because it's still a tiny bit tacky (really what gloss isn't?), but it's really pretty and shiny. I would recommend and buy again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are super cute and fun! I started out with them, and loved them! Until my teenage daughters found them and loved them too!!!

reviews.review_title: This gloss was really bad and made my lips burn
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had and enjoyed Juicy Tubes in the early 2000s. I don't know if lip glosses have just gotten so much better with time, or if this is just completely subpar to the original formula. The gloss so weird and horrible.
