I'm not even certain what the smell is. Chemicals and fake sugar? The gloss itself felt like putting petroleum glue on my lips. My hair was stuck to it before I even was finished putting it on. I was disappointed as I didn't see any color. After a few minutes my lips started to burn and hurt so I took it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My obsession was Beach Plum (please, Lancome?) since that is not possible, I tried this new cool pink mauve.   Lovely rich texture, semi-opaque application, surprisingly long wearing, huge volume.  A really pretty, non-obvious gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so excited they are back!! Bring back lots of memories!!! I like the stickiness and super long wear and shine.

reviews.review_title: Seems okay but a bit sticky for me...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a rarity for me to say “miss” on Lancôme (they have some great products altogether), but wasn’t impressed by this gloss. I’d been using Marc Jacobs and BUXOM (the latter had been my standard for lip gloss in recent years), so wanted to experiment with something different for once. That said, I might not get this again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the color Spring Fling.... the color is gorgeous - it's my ideal light pink color. It makes your lips look very glossy without looking like there's little glitter flecks on your lips. Also love the tube style, it is more convenient for me than a wand style applicator. It smells like candy. The reason I will be returning is because it is SO sticky that it is uncomfortable. It feels like your lips are going to be stuck together. I can't deal with feeling like I have syrup on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is nice, stays on a long time, doesn’t dry out my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! Brings back memories!!! And it stays on for a long time!!! Love it and it brings some color as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Marshmallow Electro, shimmery not over shimmery. Thee best original lip gloss. Smells yummy and nice consistency, not sticky.

reviews.review_title: Still in love after all these years
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited they are back! I admit that I like the stickiness and super long lasting shine. This was the shade I was wearing when I kissed my husband on our first date! Still in love with him and this gloss!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is really heavy. I wouldn't recommend wearing this on a windy day - your hair will stick to your lips for sure. The pigment of colour could be better.   Not sure if i will be ordering this again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the money. I don't like the sparkles. I would recommend the clear one before this birthday confetti look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is just as good as I remember it. I am not sure it is worth the price - but it does make lips very glossy and hydrated. Works well to go over any lipstick that might make your lips dry. I did find this gloss kind of sticky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beyond thrilled that Lacome is making these jems again.  could not find them for years.  Loved them so much I bought almost every color and then they disappeared.  So, I purchased Birthday Confetti to start.  I think Lancome reformulated because it feels a little thicker and has a bit of a tingle at first.  I love anything with sparkles and the the sheer pink is rally nice.  Love Juicy Tubes and going to purchase more!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Did I buy this just so I could live out my childhood dream of being a teenage girl in a coming of age movie in the early 2000s? Yeah I did and it feels really good. It feels really nice on, even though it was 95° today it wasn't runny, it hasn't gone off my lips yet or anything. A thick gloss with a glass like shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A friend recommended these to me because I like this style of squeeze tube lip gloss.  I compared it to my favorite drugstore brand, and the Lancome Juicy Tube won hands down, the formula is very hydrating and it lasts for hours and hours on the lips.  It's a staple in my bag now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know what it is about this gloss, but I’m glad they brought it back. It makes me feel pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received both Hallucination and Birthday Confetti Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss to try in exchange for my honest review. Personally, I liked the color of the Hallucination better as it was a more natural color vs the slight pink color of the Birthday Confetti. The Birthday Confetti has bits of confetti glitter in it, making it more for a teen/tween than an adult. Both provided a high gloss shine and shimmer!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this review higher if it matched the old one I still own, but the colors now berry colored instead of corral and that's why I ordered the same ones bc of the same name but the LOOK is COMPLETELY different! it'll still look great on me but I WAS IN LOVE with the old color formula for Magic Spell. Also it came WITH A LOT of bubbles in it, not the best look and seems slightly like wasted space for $20  pictured below is the old one on the left and new one on the right.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved the Lancôme juicy Tubes both in Hallucination and Birthday Confetti they both smells great and adds a pretty gloss to any lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love it :,)) so pretty, insanely cute packaging, love the glitter chunks in it.  doesn’t smell too strong either and is my new go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used to love Juicy Tubes, so I was glad to see them back. Unfortunately, I didn't care for this version. The smell reminded me of watermelon, which is fine, but the taste was terrible. I don't even know how to describe it, but I had to take it off. The gloss is also extremely sheer. My old favorite color used to have a lot more payoff and would even leave a subtle stain when the gloss wore off. I still really liked the texture (I find it more cushiony than sticky), but I had to send mine back.

reviews.review_title: Like being back in high school!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the sweet smell and sheet colors—these make me feel like I’m back in high school.  I just wish that they weren’t so sticky—my hair flyaways keep getting stuck on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love! It glides on smoothly and creates a beautiful shine on my lips. Not too sticky like other glosses and lasts a long time. I love the smell. I wish they would come out with more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hate it. It feels like im putting im sticky glue on my lips when I apply and burned my lips. Waste of 30 dollars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible! This tastes exactly like that fake watermelon taste that you get with cheap candy. Yuck!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I like to use Birthday Confetti alone or over my favorite lipstick to add more shine. The texture is not sticky and is pretty smooth and they smell amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these.. I normally go with a pigmented gloss because my lips are dark, but these translucents are gorgeous. The right amount of sparkle, bot too tacky and not heavy at all. Glad I was able to sample Hallucinogen and Birthday Confetti for free.  Cannot wait to try more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is great! Although it is thick, it is moisturizing. It doesn't dry out the lips and lasts for a while too. Not to mention the packaging is also cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, the colors I was sent to try were on point. You really can’t go wrong with Birthday Party & Hallucination as they were both in the nude family, with the latter having a bit more purple tint to it. Second, I did have a bit of trouble with the application because a slight squeeze goes a very, VERY long way. I had to get used to this because I’m used to having to really apply pressure to get products in similar packaging to come out. Next, it does compare similarly to other lip glosses in this style. These are, however, definitely‘juicier’. Also, they do moisturize your lips nicely! I would surely recommend them to anyone looking for a fun, shiny, somewhat glittery gloss for summer. Finally, overall, I really enjoyed these Juicy Tubes, but if you have long hair like me, you might wanna wear it in a ponytail because my hair was constantly stuck to my lips! LOL I received these products complimentary from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice lipgloss and smells just like the flavor says it should. It does not have a taste associated with it though.  It is shiny and not too sticky.  It is comparable to lip glosses I've gotten at Victoria's Secret for a much lower price.  I like the flavors of the VS ones better though, because I can actually taste them. I recommend this if you don't like to actually taste your lipgloss. It does help moisturize the lips as well. I don't think I will buy it again when I run out, but it was good to try it this time. I tried this one and hallucination. Both are sheer and do look nice on.  I recieved these free to review.  I like keeping gloss in my purse during summer because they don't get too melty and make a huge mess like some balms do if I leave it in my car.  I did notice there was some separation of the product though when I had recieved it and wasn't sure if it was associated with heat. It is too thick for it to mix together if I shake it.  That kind  of turned me off especially with a $20 price point.  It was just some clear liquid at the end of the tube furthest from the opening and I don't think it effected the actual product, but I haven't tried this brand before so it could have.  It is a nice gloss but didn't seem all that special too me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss in numbers 09 Hallucination and also number 20 Birthday Confetti. This ultra shiny hydrating lip gloss is an awesome makeup item in a beauty regime. These are very nice juicy lip glosses because do not leave the lips chaffed after use. They are very nice packaged. The tubes are a light shimmer when used for the lips. When having Lancome juicy tubes lip gloss the lip glosses do not need an immediate  reapplication. These lip glosses come in a variety of colors. Lancome is a nice brand. The colors are nice like this particular shade 20 Birthday Confetti sheer pale pink with sparkling confetti glitter is light shimmer is for every outfit fall winter spring summer and every shade of person.

reviews.review_title: Juicy Lancome tubes original hydrating lip gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss in numbers 09 Hallucination and also number 20 Birthday Confetti. This ultra shiny hydrating lip gloss is an awesome makeup item in a beauty regime. These are very nice juicy lip glosses because do not leave the lips chaffed after use. They are very nice packaged. The tubes are a light shimmer when used for the lips. When having Lancome juicy tubes lip gloss the lip glosses do not need an immediate  reapplication. These lip glosses come in a variety of colors. Lancome is a nice brand. The colors are nice like this particular shade 09 Hallucination Golden Nude light shimmer is for every outfit fall winter spring summer and every shade of person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my fav glosses. It applies so nicely and isn’t to sticky as some glosses can get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As most Lancome products I have tried before, this product is amazing - from the gorgeous packaging to the super shiny glow it leaves on your lips. I love everything about this product. I only took a star away because Lacome is not cruelty-free which is always an important aspect I consider when searching, purchasing, and using products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glossy, sexy/sweet and with a robust formula that stays on for hours - Lancome Juicy Tubes have been a staple for me since junior high. Juicy Tubes Original Color 09 Hallucination Is the perfect swipe-it-on and you’re done, YLBB sultry shimmery summer nude, and I’m here for it. Love!

reviews.review_title: I Feel Pretty with this Lip Gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this luscious lip gloss, I received 2 free samples and I am loving them both. They make my lips feel smooth, soft and loved. The colors are fanatic and give my lip a pop of color.   The gloss colors have lovely festive names & the tubes are lite-weight and perfect for carrying in your purse. The screw-top keeps the tubes from leaking. Overall, I am loving this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE glosses. This one is thick, smells like straight up roses, sticky, and tastes horrid. Maybe its just the shade  I got [which is clear] because these raves about the birthday one makes me wanna try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never leave the house without my Lancome Juicy Tube lip gloss. My favorite color is the Birthday Confetti. It goes on so smooth and silky and the shine is incredible. This lip gloss doesn't disappoint in the shine, or color department but I would like it to last longer. I find myself reapplying often but I still love it and a tube does last me quite awhile and is easy to carry around in my pocket.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancome Juicy Tubes! I can't wait to get the ones I ordered. They go on smooth and lip glossy. The colors are light and natural. I love that there bringing back something I used to love. Great product and company. Definitely would recommend. My daughter loves them too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color is so pretty!  Adds a touch of color with a glossy shine that is so flattering!  I used over my normal lipstick when I wanted a little more and then wore alone when I wanted to be a little more simple.. I'll be buying more colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the silky moist lip that this gloss offers. I love the convenient tube for application, just not the right color for me. I would definitely buy in another color (I’m 49 and glitter on my face is not good lol) Would definitely recommend this product and I LOVE anything Lancôme has!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this to try and I like it although I found it didn't smell like birthday cake. Not much tint so you can use over a lipstick.

reviews.review_title: Love my new fav Lip Gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed with Lancome Juicy Tubes lip gloss. I tried (09) Hallucination and (20) Birthday Cake, Both are lightly tinted. They are not as messy and sticky as normally Lipgloss are. My lips feel plump and super hydrated. I always suffer from dry lips, this is so awesome, smells yummy, After 10 minutes of applying the stickiness goes away. My new fav lip gloss (This review was collected as part of a promotion with Bzzagent)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. Classic shine and just a hint of color. Not too much glitter. Not super sticky. Scented and glossy- classic gloss. Nice packaging. I received this for review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Birthday Confetti and Hallucination to try and review. I absolutely love them both, Hallucination has some pigmentation in it so I usually wear it without any lipstick and the Birthday Confetti I use overtop of my favorite lip color to give it an added shimmer. I used to wear Beauty Rush which I liked but Lancôme Juicy Tubes aren’t sticky/tacky like the Beauty Rush tubes are. Juicy Tubes are definitely long lasting even after eating and drinking. I would definitely buy this product and recommend it to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: An Early 2000’s Fan Fave is Now Better Than Ever
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loveeee the Nostalgia of these Juicy Tubes! There is a reason these were big in the early 2000’s- they’re juicy!  I love the scent, the slightly sticky but not everything-is-stuck-to-your-lips vibe. Juicy tubes add the perfect amount of sheen and add a little plump.   I received both Hallucination and Birthday Confetti to try for free. I much prefer Birthday Confetti. Being NC20 in skintone, the Halluninaction color just didn’t work for me. It gave my lips a weird brownish tint that I wasn’t Vibin with. I much prefer Birthday Confetti to layer over lipstick or wear alone.  I prefer a less made-up look, so that’s also why Birthday Confetti appeals to me. Adds just a hint of glam.

I  love that there was  not a sticky/tacky feel when I applied it. They both smell and feel amazing. They are super moisturizing and long lasting. I have already recommended both to my friends and family. i will definitely purchase these and others by the same brand regularly.  I am extremely pleased with them.

Glosses typically have off-putting scents, but these were lightly sweet smelling without smelling like waxy drugstore lipbalm from your childhood. I recommend the Lancome Juicy Tubes lip gloss if you're looking for a sheer high gloss lip color.

reviews.review_text: Ok so I was super excited to receive this as a free sample to try because I've always heard great things about them, but never really felt the need to spend so much on lip gloss.  I got to try Birthday Confetti (20) as well as another one and both were very similar in terms of how long they lasted.  I would say that they lasted probably half a day for me, which isn't bad as I drink a lot and they were very moisturizing on my lips.  This one was definitely glittery, which I like, but that's really personal preference.  I didn't mind the smell or the flavor, but again that's down to personal preference.  I'm not sure if these will replace my regular lip gloss simply down to the price, but I'd definitely buy them again if they were on sale!

I do like to look at gave if you want to add a little bit of shine and tent of color. I definitely recommend this product, it was nice to use and it made putting on my make up for fun. Neither one gave off much color so I figured that they were supposed to be used as lip toppers. They are great for that. Especially over extremely dry matte liquid lipsticks! They are just what you need. The glosses definitely have the gloss and glitter factor that you need so your lips don’t dry out w a matte lipstick. I would definitely recommend this product to a friend. I would like to try some darker colors with more pigment. I am very curious to see the color pay off. Compared to some other high end lip glosses I’ve tried, there are some that are in equal quality while some have much longer staying power.

reviews.review_text: The shine! The coverage! Long lasting and really really lasts! Love the color. Very simple which I love and stunning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received  this item free from Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. While I really liked the soft non sticky texture and moisturizing effect of the juicy tube, I don't think I will be replacing my usual go to product. I find that I have to reapply often and while there are I received “birthday confetti” and “hallucination”, both are very sparkly and perhaps better for someone under 20 years of age. I do like the hydration and shine of these compact little glosses, but not all the sparkle. For this reason, I would not purchase juicy tubes for myself, but feel it’s a great product for those that like a bit of glitter.

reviews.review_title: Great liquid Shine without layers of product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasn't expecting to like the Lancome Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss. The packaging brings me back to the early 90s.  I can't believe I actually used to put up with slathering on and layer upon layer of that gooey, sticky horrible tasting formula just to get my pout to look wet and luscious!  Those lip gloss were always so thick, gooey and super sticky. Which I thought was going to be the same thing with these. However, I will say with the Lancome Juicy Tube's not only do they look beautiful they really are a pleasure to wear. They DO NOT go on gooey as you apply the pressure when squeezing the tube, and they don't feel sticky at all! Nor do you need layer upon layer of to achieve that look! I really enjoy the Shimmer in this lip gloss. It gives you just the right amount of Sparkle. Leaving your lips looking full wet and absolutely beautiful, about all the dreaded goofiness and stickiness that went along with the old 90s version lip gloss! I enjoyed both Shades as one is just a slight difference in color really not anything super pigmented however it does leave a wash of color. Out of the two colors I've tried, I'm partial to Birthday Confetti. Only because I tend to lean more towards pinky colors. Hallucination is nice as well. A very slight wash of Peachiness. Both give you just the right wash of color and perfect amount of shine! In my mind this product might be a Throwbacks from the late 80's or 90's but I like them just the same!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that they brought these back! This was my go to when I was in college! I have birthday confetti and it is subtle but has some sparkle. Just enough sparkle to not be to much. Great for afternoon brunch with your girls. It's not to sticky which is a deal breaker for me in a lip gloss. It stays on mostly. You do need to reapply after drinking, but that is pretty normal with gloss. I can't wait to try other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall this was a nice gloss. Hallucination gives the perfect hint of color is very natural looking and has a nice shine. A little glittery for my liking, but not sticky like many glosses. Each gloss I used had a nice fragrance to it. In my opinion $20 is a little pricey for a gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received two samples of this product as part of a campaign. I wanted to like it because it was Lancome and free. But it mostly just reminded me of middle school and how far my makeup preferences have advanced. It was everything like you remember from your teen years. It was sticky, tasted bad and God forbid you get your hair anywhere near it. I have not worn lip gloss in years and now I know I'm not missing anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical at first because I usually don’t do many glosses but this is awesome ! It’s not too sticky and gives the right amount of shine.  Perfect for summer if you just want something quick.  It’s subtle but very pretty and smells good too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My old school favorite is back! Lancôme, you brought the nostalgia back to the summer. This is a beautiful shade with lots of shine. I have another peachy gold shade too. Both stunning. Smells great. Not too sticky. Gives you a legit glossy lip. I believe the applicator is slightly different because it’s easier to put on the lips as you squeeze the tube. It’s a little pricey but it feels good on. It’s not gloopy and actually moisturizes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As an original user of Juicy Tubes I was over the moon to see them back - and back they are, better than ever! Birthday Confetti washes your lips in the perfect coat of shimmer with just enough shine and pow! I love it. It's not over the top but it's something special. Definitely not sticky and afterwards my lips were soft and not chapped anymore. Win/win.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved my Lancome Juicy tubes. When I got them it was easy to take out of the box and I loved the shape the tubes were in and how glossy that the lip gloss looked . It was easy to open and apply and I love how it made my lips sparkle and shine and it comes in lots of different flavors too . Mine had a fruity little taste to it and I loved that about these . I totally want to get more and am excited about these juicy tubes. They last longer then regular gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love my Lancôme Juicy tubes.  The color is beautiful.  Goes on smooth and lasts all day.  Makes my lips look like a million bucks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you loved glosses in the 90s, these are definitely for you. If you love a moisturizing gloss, these are for you. If you like to feel a thick layer from your gloss these are for you! My drawback on these is the stickiness, the goopiness makes these be hair magnets, but otherwise, if you're looking for something like this, get it. The tint is very minimal, but the variety of gloss finishes definitely makes them fun.

reviews.review_text: This gloss is very basic and average. It gives a decent shine to the lips but little color payoff. The consistency is almost gel like and very smooth. It doesn’t have a scent or taste and is not sticky. I probably won’t be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

The only negative is how thick and gooey they can get on your lips. My advice is to not use a lot. A little goes a long way! Other than that I love them and recommend the buy!

reviews.review_text: I received this gloss in two colors birthday confetti and hallucinations.  I preferred the hallucination over birthday confetti. Birthday confetti was too sparkly for me. This gloss kept my lips moist for quite some time. I applied it on dry lips and it felt nice. It was a little sticky compared to other gloss I have used. I don't find it better than other lip gloss products I have used. I think it's okay for daily use. I didn't think it was any special or different than other lip gloss products.

reviews.review_text: Loved the Lancome Juicy Tubes. They are fragrant and shiny. Stays on for a long time. They keep my lips moist. The color is just right, not too gaudy not too bright.

reviews.review_text: Makes your lips feel smooth and it has a lovely vanilla scent. I Makes your lips feel smooth and it has a lovely vanilla scent. I love that it is free of parabens. It adds a touch of color and lots of shine. It feels comfortable on the lips and it's not sticky.

reviews.review_text: This is one beautiful glossy and sparkly juicy lip gloss  I love it. My lips live all the shine, moisture and sparkle.

reviews.review_text: I LOVE Lancome Juicy Tubes! They are so comfortable on the lips. The give the perfect hint of color and the perfect shine. Not too glittery like some glosses. I would continue to buy these over and over.

reviews.review_title: It's sold out for a reason.......
reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Juicy Tubes are the only gloss I will use. I use liquid lipstick everyday, but when I want something lighter and moisturizing Birthday Confetti is my go-to. reviews.review_text: Got it as a sample. Nice color, nice scent. Not the most hydrating gloss. It does leave a sticky residue after prolonged use. I dont normally use glosses alone bc they always dry out quick. I layer the gloss over a tinted balm and it gives a great color/texture payoff.

reviews.review_text: I’m in  love with Lancome Juicy Tubes . Great moisturizer and feels smooth and hydrated for couple hours. I love the color options and texture is wonderful. Definitely recommend this to anyone.

reviews.review_text: I love this flavor/color so much! The light pink shimmer has just a hint of color. The scent reminds me of old school Bonnebell vanilla frosting gloss. 4 stars because I wish this has SPF in it, but otherwise LOVE

The lip gloss glides on easily, makes my lips feel hydrated, and smells amazing.  The colors are very pretty and very subtle. I would definitely recommend these products to others

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: love the slight glimmer and shine i get from the juicy tube. and super moisturizing

reviews.review_text: Super shiny and shimmery!  Goes on easy, not too sticky, lasts through using a straw.  I'm 39 and it doesn't look like I'm wearing a teeny bopper's gloss! LOL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. I love this shade! I prefer glosses over lip sticks. The Hallucination Lancôme Juicy Tube Lip Gloss adds pop, shine and color to my lips! My skin is a tan shade naturally and I think it compliments it well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hello lips! This gloss coats the lip without being gummy. I loved the tiny iridescent glitter specks that glimmered without being childish. I recommend this gloss alone or as combined with a lipstick. It is not for the shy at heart because I felt as if my lips popped in public.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Juicy Tubes Birthday Confetti from BzzAgent in exchange for my review. I was so excited to see they are back! This was THE lipgloss back in the day. Always had one in my pocket or purse. It gives a gloss but it also moisturizes your lips so good. Wear it under or over lipstick or plain lip it works. This particular shade has the lightest hint of pink and sparkeles I like it over top other lipsticks.

reviews.review_title: Moisturizing and Long Lasting, but Sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome's Juicy Tubes has quickly become my go to lip gloss.  My main complaint with most lip glosses is that they dry out my lips and require constant re-application.  Juicy Tubes felt moisturizing and lasted for hours.  The only downside is that you have to be careful not to apply too much or it will feel sticky and heavy.  Birthday Confetti goes on clear and provides a pop of shimmer, and Hallucination provides a nude lip look.  I have fair skin, and both shades were flattering and versatile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I was given the opportunity to sample this product, I was elated!  This is a throwback to my teenage years! The iconic Lancôme Juicy Tubes are back! They come in a  0.5 fl oz squeeze tube and an array of colors.  I received the Lancôme Juicy Tubes in the colors 09 Hallucination and 20 Birthday Confetti, to try out.  When you apply them, the base color shown in the tube is not really noticable at all. The formula feels like a thick lip balm, and not sticky at all. The glitter doesn't feel gritty and adds a subtle shimmer, that catches the light nicely.  Hallucination is a light beige color with micro gold glitter and has a sweet light vanilla scent and taste.    Birthday Confetti is a pale pink color with iridescent glitter. I must have received a bad tube of this one or something, because it smells like chemicals and tastes even worse.  Overall, I am not too impressed with this product. It does not perform any different then less costly and comparable products from other brands. In fact I have drugstore glosses that I prefer more. Although the packaging is iconic, it feels cheap. These are the reasons I only am giving this product only 3 stars.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancone Juicy Tubes lip gloss is amazing! It's not sticky, just hydrating with a pillow softness. It is tasteless, but somehow your mouth is full of juicy deliciousness while wearing. It's the most pleasant thing, but a bit mysterious. I have tried both a glitter and a sheer and I like them both, very much. They stay on for a long time and wear off gracefully, with no uncomfortable residue. These apply easily from the slanted tip of the tube for a no mess, one-handed application. They are great to keep in your purse for quick gloss ups, and leave my lips soft and supple for hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the color and the shine on my lips.  It’s a little thicker than my usual product.  I would recommend to friends.  I don’t really use lip stick so I like the look of Lancôme Juicy Tubes on my lips!

reviews.review_title: Wow is all I am gonna say.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful and moisturizing, no sticky formula, with a hint of color. Looks amazing with a tan and leaves your lips feeling highly moisturized. Also works amazing over mat lipsticks for that glow. It also makes my lips look plum and is amazing. This is my new go too daily moisturizing gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful lip gloss. I usually hate a lip gloss because it is usually so thick and sticky. This is not it is very moisturizing and thin yet covers amazingly.  My lips feel and look more plump and moisturized than ever before. The packaging is also very cute. Their isn’t a whole lot of sparkle but just enough to give that glow. Also works perfect over my mat lippys. I highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip gloss with lasting moisture and fabulous color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancome Juicy Tubes. The birthday confetti is my favorite! I purchased these few years ago. I tried them again when I got them recently. They seem less sticky than what they were years ago, but still have lasting staying power and shiny. I feel my lip smooth and soft. I think it is better than most of the tubes. I'd recommend it to my friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shimmer and sparkle, it moisturized my lips immediately!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the ultra glossy formula of Juicy Tubes. They are cute and smells nice and fruity too! These juicy tubes definitely help to achieve those lip gross ads high shine look. They are ever slightly tinted so it's nice to layer with lipstick too. Texture is rather thick but not sticky. It keeps your lips glossy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lip gloss! Stays on your lips a long time and doesn’t feel sticky. Beautiful colors and high shine. My new favorite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for any age. It left my lips moist and soft. The color options are endless and they even have glittery options which my daughter loves! I highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: Lancôme’s Juicy Tubes is always a treat to use. The smell is faint vanilla that’s not overpowering. High shine and long lasting. Love that it stays on for a long time. Makes my lips extremely soft and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love my Lancôme Juicy Tubes! It’s really easy to apply and goes on so nice and smooth. A little bit really goes a long way. After applying it leaves a small scent and taste to the tongue. It gives my lips a really nice even color and shine. I feel like it also helps moisturize and keep them looking great and youthful! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice color and shine most definitely! Compared to other products this definitely is in my top three!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Multiple shades are gorgeous! I’ve bought this for my sister as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how Lancome Juicy Tubes make my lips look and feel, glossy and smooth. It's easy to bring along, with no mess or spillage, and no melting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t wear lip gloss often but when I do I like shiny, shimmery ones. This was had just that, a subtle color but summery shine. The only thing I didn’t really care for is that I can tell I’m wearing it and my lips don’t feel moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received those to try out on their relaunch and needles to say my old favorite gloss is still marvelous! The formula is consistent with the original and the colors are super fun and give my lips the juicy perfect pot look plus this sparkly and fun shade its absolutely stunning both by itself , paired with a bit of lipliner or as a topper for your favorite lipstick! Smells so yummy too! I will definitely grab more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love a good lip gloss and I was very excited about trying out this product. I received the ‘Birthday Confetti’ and ‘Hallucination’ colors. The ‘Birthday Confetti’ is a clear gloss with little sparkle while ‘Hallucination’ is a slightly tinted “nude” color. Both of them made my lips look so juicy. The product is a tad sticky on the lips but not tacky or greasy looking at all!  Compared to other products, I feel like I didn’t have to reapply as much which is great! I also believe that my lips were still hydrated, so I didn’t have to put on chapstick before applying it.

I enjoy these glosses a lot. They’re just a wash of color. They’re very thick but not in a goopy way. They last for a few hours. I would definitely recommend them.

reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss! It looks great and it smells great too! This is my new favorite!!!!

reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try Lancome Juicy Tubes! It gives amazing shine and subtle color. It was great alone or on top of other lip color. My only con was it was rather sticky and with the windows down my hair sticks to my lips. I got the color Birthday confetti to try and it was extremely neutral just a bit of sparkle. I would definitely try this in different colors just not on windy days! It would get 5 stars if it was less sticky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this juicy lip gloss! It has just a hint of golden shimmer. It is smooth and moisturizing   and has high shine. Overall veery cute and will get lots of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lipgloss. It’s just perfect texture and gives the perforce shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried out Lancome's Juicy Tubes in the following sparkle and shimmer formulas: Hallucination and Birthday Confetti. Both tints and sparkly shininess is not what I typically wear. However, the more I wore Hallucination, the more the nude color grew on me. I like it because it provides hours of long-lasting moisturization. It literally makes your lips feel juicy.   Now Birthday Confetti was a different story for me. It offers a transparent sheen across the lips with a faint sparkle effect. There are tiny particles of sparkle, and I can feel them on my lips. I don't like the way this formula feels, and it just doesn't seem as juicy as Hallucination.    I feel like the Juicy product line provides an ultra-hydrating lip experience that I'd recommend to family and friends. Depending on which tint you get, the product also creates a fresh, understated look for the lips.   I would purchase a Lancome Juicy Tube in the future, but for me, I'd prefer a shade that offered a little more lip color, like their Magic Spell, but Hallucination is a decent, non-distracting shiny choice I wouldn't mind having again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this gloss by Lancome Juicy Tubes. Not only does it smell nice, it also glides on smoothly and leaves your lips shiny/sparkly. I like how the color is transparent, but also has a lot of shine with a hint of color that can be applied with lipstick for different looks. It was sticky, but not so sticky that it made your lips feel tacky like some of the other brands out there. I highly recommend this and would suggest it to my friends.

reviews.review_title: Nice scent but a little sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good lip gloss to use if you just want something sheer. Received 2 colors to try (Hallucination & Birthday Confetti). Both had a nice scent and glide on easily. Very pretty packaging. The formula is a little thick and sticky, more than I usually like. Overall they are good. You can wear both shades alone or over a lipstick to make a little more shiny. I would recommend, but would not say they are my absolute favorite lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Never tried before but last longer and kissable proof it’s glitter and shine gives a sophisticated look day or night which I like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing It left my lips soft and smooth it stayed in for at least 8 hrs and boy did my lips shine with this!! I highly recommend this big game changer!!

reviews.review_title: My New Holy Grail of Lip Glosses!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge Lip Gloss junkie. I have tried so many different brands through the years. Let me say how pleasantly surprised I was when I tried these Lancome Juicy Tubes in Birthday Confetti and Hallucination. Not only are they absolutely stunning, they deliver the right amount of shine to my lips. They smell delicious, glide on smoothly and not too heavy or sticky like other brands I have used. They keep my lips feeling super soft and hydrated throughout the day and look beautiful alone or as a topcoap on Lipstick. I will definitely be purchasing more of these Juicy Tubes and recommending them to my family and friends. These are now my new holy grail of Lip Glosses!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received two Lancôme Juicy Tubes from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest feedback, and I’m quite pleased with them!  I actually prefer this hydrating lip gloss over the traditional lip balm I usually use.  My lips feel soft and smooth, and the colors I received (20 Birthday Confetti and 09 Hallucination) are appealing.  To be honest, I was thrown off by the shine and sparkles at first, but it is much more subtle upon application.  There is a slightly sweet scent, but not much taste.  I would definitely consider purchasing this product in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received two Lancôme Juicy Tubes from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest feedback, and I’m quite pleased with them!  I actually prefer this hydrating lip gloss over the traditional lip balm I usually use.  My lips feel soft and smooth, and the colors I received (20 Birthday Confetti and 09 Hallucination) are appealing.  To be honest, I was thrown off by the shine and sparkles at first, but it is much more subtle upon application.  There is a slightly sweet scent, but not much taste. reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love Lancôme Juicy Tubes! The color was sheer and glossy with some sparkle and it tasted excellent. It stayed on well, especially for a gloss, and made my lips feel great. It went on very smooth and never felt sticky or grainy. It was by far one of the best lip glosses I have used. I would definitely buy these in the future and would recommend them to a friend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample. I was afraid this would be like most lip glosses that are thick and sticky, but it wasn’t! It lasted for hours. My daughter loved it too! So much she stole it from me. I will be buying my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome has never failed to satisfy me! These Juicy Tube lip glosses are so shimmery and pretty, long lasting and smell amazing. They aren't super sticky like other lip glosses, these are more oily feeling (which is a good thing!) and my long hair doesn't stick to my lips. I would highly recommend Lancome's Juicy Tubes. They are far superior than your average lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: colors: 09 Hallucination, 20 Birthday Confetti  There are few things worse than sticky lipgloss - it messes with your hair, your skin, your beverage container, whoever you kiss... I can't honestly recall whether I wore Juicy Tubes in the aughts - as a student, probably not - my budget was more drugstore then, so I can't comment on whether the formula has changed since returning. It's great now though.  Both of the colors I acquired are light; Birthday Confetti is a lovely sparkly baby pink - it's not glittery enough to be an evening shade, but the particles are large enough that you can feel them when you rub your lips together - it's a weird combo. Hallucination is a frosty nude - hearkening back to the 90s. The color is not opaque, but it's enough not to work with my skin; I have a friend with a more olive complexion that this color looks great on. Overall, the juicy tubes have an easy application process, spread nicely, and feel great on my lips. It's not a long-wear product, but due to the easy application, I have no fear of reapplying without a mirror. Definitely worth checking out :)  *I removed a star because Birthday Confetti smells like coconut, which I hate. Not enough to avoid wearing mind you, so if the other colors are scented differently, I'll return that

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample to try and review from BzzAgent. I received birthday confetti and hallucination. I absolutely love both colors! I’m a big fan of gloss and shimmer. Probably because I grew up in the 80’s and that was all the rage lol. These have awesome scents, great hint of color and the shimmer to them is amazing! They are not sticky like most glosses and it lasts for quite a while before needing reapplied. I have found my new go to gloss for sure. Can’t wait to add more colors to my makeup case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a big fan of Juicy Tubes years ago, so when I heard they were bringing them back, I was thrilled.  I got both Hallucination, which is a sheer nude color, and Birthday Confetti which is a pinkish clear with sparkles to test and review.  Both are extremely thick and I didn't remember the ones back in the day being quite as...for lack of a better term.....gloppy.  But that also translated to them being quite long lasting for a lip gloss, which I love.  Neither of the shades I got thrilled me, especially the Birthday confetti since I'm not that into glitter/sparkles, but I would definitely love to try a few of the other shades.  I've gotten used to always using Buxom lip glosses, which are also a bit thick, but nowhere near as much as the Juicy Tubes and have quite a bit more slip.  If I find some shades I like, these will definitely become part of my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin

The formula is just right not too sticky like some other brands I’ve tried. Smells amazing as well. I love the shine, the glossier the better for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried two colors of Lancome Juicy Tubes “hallucination” and “birthday confetti” I have been wearing gloss for years and I gotta say these are so much better than most! My lips were a bit chapped and these felt so hydrating not sticky. The sparkle and shine of these are amazing and made me feel so pretty. Hallucination have a subtle mauve to it and complemented my olive skin tone.Hallucination has a very subtle flavor which I like. Birthday confetti was lighter in hue and super sparkly. The flavor of Birthday confetti was reminiscent of coconut to me and a bit more noticeable. I’m looking forward to pairing this gloss with lipstick for extra glam. I will definitely be purchasing more Lancome Juicy Tubes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just an amzing gloss! No sticky or jeavy feel and it totally left my lips plumpy and luscious and kissable! I can't stress enough how light it was on my lips, like no other gloss I've ever used before

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE Lancome Juicy Tubes. Both colors I tried, birthday confetti and hallucination, are both equally beautiful. I love that it has a light fruity smell, however, there is no taste.  The Lancome Juicy Tubes are high quality. When you apply the lip gloss they go on smooth and evenly. It is not sticky or tacky feeling. Your lips feel really hydrated and soft.  The colors look darker in the tube than how they appear on the lips. I have attached a picture of the colors on my hand.  The hallucination is more of a natural color and the birthday confetti is more of a shimmer/glitter look. Again both beautiful.  I have used tons of lip gloss brands and this is my favorite because of all the above mentions. If you use this your lips will always be super soft.  I would purchase the Lancome Juicy Tubes in all colors and I recommend you do the same!!

reviews.review_text: This product is fun and sparkly!  I love the added gloss and glitter that if gives my lips.  It is great for every day or when I want to dress up.  The only negative is the stickiness, I applied it one day before eating breakfast, and all of the crumbs from my toast stuck to my lips.  I had to wipe it off and start over.  I really enjoy the Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss and feel more beautiful when I wear it. It is the perfect finishing touch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found a lip gloss that lasts. Compared to others, Lancome definitely has a high quality product in it's Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss. It lasts most of the day and I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received both Hallucination and Birthday confetti! Love both colors! One is fun and flirty while the other one is more profesh! Love the moisture that they provide and they definitely last long! I would definitely recommend for anyone who loves great moisture and fun colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received these for free in exchange for a review.  So I tried these many many years ago when they first came out.  I wasn't a big fan of the formula back then and it looks like they have improved on it over the years.  I was sent 2 different colors to try out- Birthday Confetti and Hallucination.  Neither are colors that I would normally pick out because I prefer reds and purples.  Both colors are sheer with very little color payoff; they basically just give you a pop of shimmer if you want to go for a natural look or you could use them to liven up your lipstick color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss! It smells amazing and it leaves the best shine on my lips than any other product I’ve tried!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancome juicy gloss smells amazing and it leaves your lips feeling nice and soft after applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Birthday Confetti and Hallucination. Both are nice and feel great on the lips. It's pretty moisturizing and gives a nice shine. Birthday Confetti has sparkles in it which is kind of fun. When applied the first few times, I didn't notice any sparkles coming from the tube but the last few times I've noticed them. The glosses are not sticky but they don't last very long so I've definitely had to reapply. Overall, I think they are good products and would recommend them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color...the gloss.. unbelievable .. long lasting ,got alot of compliments

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these lipglosses, they go on smooth and they last hours, they aren't sticky like most lip glosses and the colors/flavors are the best!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved Lancome 's juicy tubes liogloss. They smell great, go on smooth, and best of all moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color and nice shimmer. It very glossy and doesnt wear off quickly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received two free samples of the Lancome Juice Tube through BzzAgent and they are so good for the spring season where I get natural, fresh and clean makeup.  These two colors are perfect for that, Birthday Confetti and Hallucination are very creamy without being sticky, they are bright, it also has a rich smell but I did not feel any taste in my mouth.  They go straight to the portfolio for day to day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancome juicy gloss smells amazing and it leaves your lips feeling nice and soft after applying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss! I always wanted Juicy Tubes when I was in middle school & am so happy they brought them back. This gloss is super shiny & literally lasts all day, keeping my lips really hydrated. Will definitely be buying more in different colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the look of this lip gloss on my lips. I also like how it moisturizes (it really does). The downside, in my opinion, is how it feels and lasts. It is thick and sticky feeling when first applied. After a few minutes, this subsides, probably as it is absorbed. As for long lasting, well, it's not. To keep the look, I had to reapply every 30-45 minutes. While I love the look, this won't be my go to gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so good! It brings back early 2000's feels! I haven't been able to find a good gloss in a lomg while but this is it! Not only does it shine, it doesn't taste bad either!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Natural... Last for hours. Such a beautiful shade goes with everything.

reviews.review_title: Hallucination is a great every day color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

I liked the squeeze tube applicator for quick application throughout the day without the need to use both hands. I liked both colors I received but Hallucination was my favorite as it was a nude color which looked polished.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very lovely colors. A little too sticky for me.Reminds me of the lip gloss from the 90's.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely recommend this lip gloss compared to others it last so much longer. Its the right amount of thickness and glitter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome juicy tube is amazing it goes on smooth and hydrated my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome juicy tubes is amazing it goes on smooth and hydrated my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

The only problem with that is it is very sticky so fly always get stuck in it but you kind of expect that with shiny gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This color was warm, but not a good match for me. It was too light and didn't compliment my cool-toned skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
