reviews.review_text: Omg these juicy tubes bring me back to the old days! I used to wear them daily and now that we got them again I am back in love!!!! So moist! Keeps my lips moist and perfect coloring!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this color! The tint and shimmer were perfect for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning! Lasts for hours and leaves my lips feeling very soft afterwards and conditioned, such a beautiful shade goes with everything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the nude color and the product had a great scent. It was really thick and long lasting. It provides the perfect amount of shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this lip gloss! It was super long lasting and It’s smells amazing! I love the shine it gives.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved Lancome's Juicy Tubes in Birthday Confetti and Hallucination from BzzAgent in exchange for a review. Both were very easy to apply. Birthday Confetti had sparkle to it which made it a nice finish over my favorite color. Hallucination had a hint of color with some shimmer which made it nice to wear alone for a subtle hint of color when I was going for more of a natural look. Neither left my lips sticky or tacky feeling like most glosses I've tried. It doesn't last long though or stay in place well. But it's still a new favorite for date night and lip hydration. It definitely left my lips feeling soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveee this lipgloss! its so thick and longlasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a VERY hydrating formula, I swear if put it on with peeling lips my lips will feel smooth within a few minutes of putting it on. It smells really good and I don’t think the smell is strong enough to offend anyone. Also it’s really not sticky at all. I just love this gloss and Ik others will too.also the tube is huge so it last for ages. I definitely recommend the purchase of Lancome juicy tubes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These definitely remind me of my middle school days where all the girls would wear all the fruit poppin lip glosses. I did like using this product it does stay on for quite some time and my lips do feel plump & juicy. I like the colors I got since they were not like red or purple since i prefer neutral more natural looks the 2 colors birthday confetti & hallucination were in my favor.  I like how it is not heavy scented too since some lip glosses smell terrible but this one was pleasant.   I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love the colors (I have this and Hallucination), the smell, the super cute names and the tube with applicator. The little additions with glitter and sparkle are fantastic when it hits the light just so. They give your lips a super pucker and it lasts for longer then many others, there is just only one issue that I had to dock a star for. They are a little sticky for my taste. Because I love EVERYTHING else about these, I will definitely keep using to see if it is something I can get used to. Oh goodness I hope so!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how this lip gloss shines when I'm wearing it and it doesn't have a nasty taste with it either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss was just ok it was really sticky on my lips and you can actually feel the chunks of glitter in it. Very uncomfortable on the lips and not worth $20

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked that lip gloss. The color is really light, great quality and what I like the most that it is not as sticky as majority of lip glosses. That is amazing product and as a bonus it smells amazing!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these Lancôme Juicy Tube Lip Glosses. They glide on smooth and look great. This lip gloss makes my lips super shiny without leaving them sticky and heavy. The formula is just right. The applicator works well. Hands down, the best lip gloss I have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this product gives whatever lipstick I choose to wear that day a very nice finish ! not too too sticky and just the right shimmer !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried many lip glosses and this one is definitely one of the better ones.  This lip gloss last a long time and does not wear off quickly like most do.  The texture is not very sticky either which I like.  The gloss is also moisturizing and doesn't leave my lips feeling dry and chapped.

reviews.review_title: Glamour and beauty in a tube
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love this Lancôme Juicy Tube lip gloss. Great taste and color and it’s not goopy or slimy, it goes on smooth. Would definitely recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Lancôme lip gloss! Pretty colors, nice shine, and goes on smoothly, not too much, not too little. Gloss lasted awhile on my lips.. great product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this juicy tube, it gives you a perfect little hint of shine and it smells great. You can wear it dressing up or down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. It gives my lips a gloss with a subtle tint. My favorite smelling gloss! Applying it is a treat in itself. I feel like it is moisturizing also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nice lip gloss. I like the thick texture. Nice shine and moisturizers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is so fun! Great color, name, and very pleasant sent and taste! I let my niece try it and she couldn't get enough! Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My new lip piercing staple!!! I received Hallucination & Birthday Confetti. High shine!! Super glossy! Long lasting and smells great... not overpowering and doesn’t taste bad at all. I love the shimmery glitter in birthday confetti! Price point is perfect! This doesn’t have a wand to it makes it very convenient to pop in your bag and use on the go..... just remove the cap and apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received two lip glosses complimentary from Bzzagent to review. It's been years since I've used lip gloss. I haven't really been into the glossy look in a while but I was VERY interested in seeing how Lancome compared. I am pleasantly surprised at how well both of these lip glosses performed. They really exceeded my expectations. I have Hallucination and Birthday confetti. BC is a cute clearish gloss full of glitter. Hallucination looks like it may have a rose tint but it comes out clear as well. Its more shimmery as opposed to having glitter. They both smell absolutely divine. They feel amazing on. No greasy feeling at all. Moisture lasts all day.I absolutely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with how JUICY this Lip Gloss is, the thickness and shine is out of this world! This is now my go to lip gloss over all my other ones! I absolutely love how this gloss looks and makes my lips feel. Even after taking it off my lips feel hydrated after using! I highly recommend this to every one who has been looking for a great Gloss for those lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is awesome!!! I like a gloss that has great coverage and lasts, which this does. Some may say it’s a little heavy or sticky, which it is, and that’s why it lasts! Your hair will definitely get stuck in this stuff... Super easy to apply, neutral color to go with any outfit and hydrated, luscious looking lips. Highly recommend this stuff, especially for summer time lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only decided to give 4 out of 5 stars simply because of personal preferences.  I prefer my gloss to stay glossy as this one starts out, however, soon it became too sticky as I wore it.  Given that, I would still recommend the product to friends because it's great, it's just a personal choice on the sticky part.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great neutral shade I also tried the birthday confetti and like that as well I prefer hallucination because it doesn’t have any taste. Both are great alone and both could be used over another color as well as a gloss! I like how sticky and shiny they are even applied over a nude lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome juicy tubes are not only super hydrating but, look great while providing the needed hydration. I received so many compliments while wearing this gloss, when any light hits your lips, it looks as if you've had lip injections in the best way. These colors go great with any outfit and make your lips look absolutely kissable. This lipgloss will forever be my very favorite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, 700+ sample reviews..ANYWAY, i'm in love with this gloss. It is VERY tacky, so sticky. Your hair will stick to your lips. Buuut the thickness and tackiness makes the gloss stick to my lips and lasts long. Hallucination smells like cotton candy, and doesn't give you that vaseline taste. Feels hydrating and it looks like it plumps my lips/makes it plushy. Looks so good alone, amazing on two toned lips. The shimmer is very fine, so it dazzles in the light. I like that this is a tube and not a doe foot applicator. It makes it easy to sanitize and wipe down if you're applying over another lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually can't use lip gloss, I can't stand sticky, but this is not your usual lip gloss. Shiny and hydrating without any of the usual stickiness, I can wear this all day without my hair sticking to my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Matches my lips and goes good with any makeup application. Better than lipstick and glides on better, easy removal. Would buy! Would refer friends to it too. Natural and beautiful looking lips , no faking here.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Juicy Tube in Birthday Confetti to try and I actually really enjoyed this product!!...I normally am not a huge fan of lip glosses. But Lancomes product is not at all sticky and unnatural feeling on your lips. It has a pleasant, not overwhelming scent/flavor. It glides on great and I've worn daily over my lip color!...Would absolutely purchase this product, Thank You!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like all the glitter In the Birthday cake Lancôme Juicy tubes and it just lets me go natural without putting on any lipstick. I also like how it slides on my lips no squeezing like some lip glosses are. The smell is fresh of the lip gloss. The tube just makes me feel special with all the stars on it.Easy application and removal. I would buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore this lipgloss, its definitely my favorite one. I love how it makes my lips look and feel. My lips stay smooth, and hydrated. I definitely recommend them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay so I really liked these two. Gloss is a hit or miss with me. The Confetti gloss was just the right amount of shine needed. The Hallucination tube was a happy mixture of tint and shine. The only thing I didn’t really care for was the tacky/sticky texture of the gloss on my lips. Felt like they were semi glued feeling. But all in all love them and so does my daughter   *i did receive both tubes in a free sample box in the mail*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color for lip gloss.  Sticky, but that is normal for lip gloss.  Great Color, but very very sheer color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these Juicy Tubes!! It feels great on my lips and looks great! I will definitely be buying more once the need arises!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this lip gloss. It matches my skin tone perfectly. It gives my lips shine and color without the stickiness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this color! It wasn’t sticky like normal glosses and I didn’t have to reapply it as often as others as well. My lips felt softer after as well

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a little sparkle on the lips.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What I like about this gloss is it's not sticky. There is nothing worse that your hair sticky all over your lips. These add a nice shine to your lip and doesn't have a weird taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was really happy with the wet shiny appearance it leaves on the lips, compared to other lip gloss I have tried this one lasts longer and smells great. I received this product as a free sample box.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s alright, I’m not that impressed. It kinda feels like I could spend way less money for the same results. The texture is nice but the smell reminds me of baby oil. It started to burn my lips after a few minutes too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky enough to recieve this color and also the Lancome Juicy Tubes in the shade Hallucination from BzzAgent. I absolutely love these tubes filled with just the perfect amount of color and shimmer. I love wearing these alone unless I'm going out then I apply them over my favorite lipstick. They are not sticky and they feel so luxurious on my lips. The packaging on these truly Juicy Tubes is so trendy yet very simple.  I am hooked and so is my daughter. I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing lip gloss. Has a soft lushly shine without it being to over noticeable. Prefect for a night on the town.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The two colors that I tried are the Hallucination #9 and the Birthday Confetti #20. Hallucination has a sparkle and is a golden nude coloring.  Birthday Confetti is a sheer pale pink with sparkling confetti glitter.  You don’t have to apply a lot, a little goes a long way, and the color and sparkle last a long time.  What I loved is that it is hydrating and not overly sticky.  I wear it alone or on top of a liner or lipstick to give it a glossy finish.  I am very impressed with the Juicy Tubes and would definitely recommend them to someone looking for hydration, color, and long-wearing lip gloss.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product smells like candy! It adds a nice shimmer and softness to your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite gloss. It is so smooth and moisturizing, not at all sticky, and it smells amazing. I did get to try it for free through bzzagent, but loved it so much, I immediately went online and ordered several more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very nice lip gloss. I love the appearance of the product on my lips. It has a nice amount of shine and just the right touch of glitter. It is long lasting, goes on fairly smooth, and feels good when applied. I love the shade too. It is quite appealing. It is light and natural looking. The only issue I have with it is the texture feels slightly sticky, it's not overly bad, but I do notice it a bit. Other than that it is a great product overall. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is is the best I’ve tried. It applies beautifully, lasts an incredibly long time, and isn’t overly sticky as some glosses can be. I love how supple and soft it makes my lips feel, and the scent is absolute heaven! I received two shades. The first is Birthday Cake which is a clear baby pink with iridescent glitter. (The glitter doesn’t irritate my lips at all.) This is by far my favorite color. I also received Hallucination which is a frosted peachy nude with glitter. It’s a very pretty shade as well. I will definitely be purchasing more shades because these are amazing glosses. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very particular about lip gloss. I hate a sticky/tacky feeling. The juicy tube is perfect. Goes on smooth and lasts hours. Has a great taste too! I love the high shine and great color. Can be used alone or over lipstick. Lots of shimmer to add some pop.

reviews.review_title: Juicy Tubes are Back Better Than Ever!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is just like the original Juicy Tubes out 20 years ago. Slightly sticky with a good hint of color and lots of hydration to keep your lips smooth. I love the shade selection. Hallucination is great for any occasion. I also had Birthday Confetti which looks great on its own or or a lipstick. The slight stickiness helps it wear longer otherwise it would slide right off your lips.Lancome always does a good job. I think this is definitely worth $20.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These work great on top of my matte lippies to make my lips feel not so dry and it gives a great sparkle. Not a lot of color, but I just like the shimmer and not having my lips feel like they are going to crack under the matte lipstick. The formula is a tad sticky, but that is pretty much all glosses so it is not a big deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is super cute and fun to wear on any occasion. It can be top with another lip color or just simply wear on it's own. I love the sheerness to it and the light glitter it has to make your lips pop. It also smells very good and yummy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning color! Goes on great by itself or on top lip color. Love the sparkles!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancôme juicy tubes original lip gloss is gorgeous!! Goes on smooth and moisturizes your lips. A little bit heavy but love the nude look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is so beautiful! I’m in love with it. It is ultra glossy giving the lips a wet, dripping, sexy effect. It smells delicious also. And last of all, it lasts a long time on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss. It really gives me a great gloss on my lips. Before using it, my lips were parched and moistened.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great neutral color with a nice shinny gloss. Really hydrates you lips and this color is soft more natural tone which is wonderful. I have been looking for a good gloss and this one looks and feels wonderful. I recommend this for anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fun hydrating lip gloss with specks of glitter. Very moisturizing and easy to apply. Plan to purchase again and I recommend this for anyone looking for a fun and good lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss is a very good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, this gloss was a loser for me. I'm not usually a gloss person, and this one got added to the list. It was sticky, and the glitter was rough on my lips. I also unfortunately experienced a burning sensation while wearing the gloss, and when I tried to remove it, the glitter stuck to my lips and was almost impossible to wipe off.

reviews.review_title: EVERYONE HAS TO TRY THESE JUICY TUBES!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hands down Lancôme Paris is a Leader in Lip Gloss with Juicy Tubes Ultra Shiny Hydrating formula. They are comfortable and long wearing, never sticky at all. I was given two colors to try for my honest review and I love them both and will definitely be ordering more again and again for as long as they are available. Hallucination is a gorgeous nude that looks great with all my different makeup looks. The other color Birthday Confetti gives your lips high shine and I wear it alone and on top of a color lipstick for a finished beautiful lip look. If you are considering ordering Juicy Tubes don’t wait another minute, you will love the way they look and feel on your lips and they are worth every penny. I am going to order more for sure.

reviews.review_title: Turned me into a lip gloss girl!
reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a truly fabulous lip gloss. It goes on super smoothly and produces a brilliant shine on the lips. It's not waxy like lip balm and it doesn't make those annoying gummy bits when it wears off. I absolutely hate that about lip balm. This stuff simply disappears after a couple of hours and you can easily apply more. It's not sticky but you can feel it a little bit when you rub your lips together.   I tried the Birthday Confetti and Hallucination colors. Confetti has bright glitter sparkles and a delightful vanilla smell. It doesn't add any color to my lips to speak of, but you can see the glitter faintly. Hallucination gave my lips a faint blush color which I liked more. Both colors gave the same brilliant shine. 10/10 definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I do loved this lipgloss. I hate lipstick because it’s so thick and heavy. Lipgloss is my fav. I loved the glid, the smell and the color. Looking forward to purchasing some other colors.

reviews.review_title: Best lip gloss I have ever tried !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Simply the best lip gloss I have ever tried. I have received this lip gloss complimentary for review purposes. And I loved it ! It's not sticky as most of lip glosses, very comfortable to wear. And this really adds shine and volume to the lips. I Tried it on bare lips and on lipstick. Loved both ! Definitely recommend !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've never been a gloss woman... Ever. Not even as a child. So, when I received this to try out... I was pretty much set in my ways. But my goodness! LET ME TELL YOU!!! This gloss is super soft, and satiny. It glides on like butter and gives the absolute PERFECT hint of shimmer and color. It so light, you'll barely remember you have it on. There's also barely any scent to it, unless it is just my allergies acting up on me and blocking me from smelling its goodness. Goodbye Balm!! HELLO JUICY TUBES!! I am definitely getting stocked up on more of these beauties once they're back in stock!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These definitely have earned the hype surrounding them over the years. I was never one of the lucky ones to have a stash of these in middle school like many of my peers, but I appreciate it more as an adult now anyway. These do exactly as they say -- they provide enough gloss to make your lips look juicy. They are a bit sticky, but I do not mind that at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is awesome! I must say, this is the best gloss I have used yet! I would definitely recommend. I will continue to use and purchase in the future.

reviews.review_text: I received hallucination & birthday confetti as a free sample. I am loving both shades. They are fun and sexy. They also keep your lips moisturize which is always a plus when I get lip gloss.

reviews.review_text: Not a lip gloss fan? Think again! This impressed this former lip gloss hater.  It is long lasting and not sticky. I am in love! The color is gorgeous as as said before, it stayed on all day for me without smudging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think these Lancome Juicy Tubes are great. The colors are nice. This color of pink is my favorite. It goes on smoothly. It has a nice scent. I was really impressed with how good it looked, and felt. I would definitely recommend this product.

I'm so impressed with this lip gloss! One thing that struck me immediately is the packaging reminds me of my days as a teenager with the gooey lipglosses and the squeeze tube -- which is a HAPPY MEMORY -- but also that this product is superior to anything I've used as a teenager! I love the texture, the flavor, and the fact that it almost becomes part of you, not a greasy mess sliding around on your lips! Fabulous, five stars, I'll buy again!

reviews.review_text: I love it! It smells great & last a long time. I will definitely be buying this soon.

reviews.review_text: I've always been a fan of Lancomes Juicy Tubes. They come in so many different colors and varying degrees of sparkle! I really liked Hallucination. I did remove a star because I'm not a fan of the tube. It looks a little cheap and like I got it at Claires or something. I much prefer lip gloss with wands. I hope they change that soon.

I definitely wouldn't wear this gloss with your hair down on a windy day if you don't like hair stuck to your lips, but if you're looking for some juicy looking puckers, then these are the glosses for you! reviews.review_text: I loved this product. It has a slight color to tint your lips as well as being glossy and hydrating. It's perfect for dress up or casual or anywhere in between.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously my new favorite lip gloss. The color and shine look great and last, but even better than that, this lip gloss moisturizes my lips unlike other products I've tried. Chapped lips is something that I struggle with but Lancome Juicy Tubes makes my lips both look and feel great! I would definitely recommend this product. I received a full size sample in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received these lipglosses for free and really love this lipgloss so much! It goes on so smooth compared to others that I have tried. Also I love how small it is so I can take it wherever even in a small purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These go on easily and smooth, are lightweight and are available in great colors. They’re a great gloss that moistures and enhances lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes are versatile, wear well on the lips and look absolutely stunning.  The packaging is great! A little tube that fits in a purse, pocket, bag or wherever you need it. The screw cap ensures the product doesn't ooze out inside of your expensive purse. You squeeze the product out of a slanted top, making application easy and mess free.  I'm specifically reviewing 2 colors. Birthday Cake (20) and Hallucination (09). Both are great to wear on their own as they really have an amazing, light catching shimmer. They are perfect for no makeup- makeup days. Both apply super easy and glide over the lips. Hallucination is a bit thicker than Birthday Cake, but neither are super sticky or tacky. I have also layered both tubes over every color immanagible (or at least in my collection). I'm totally obsessed with how these take a flat lip color to a whole other level! Birthday Cake has gorgeous metallic flecks that pick up and reflect light for a drop dead gorgeous look. Hallucination has more gold and earth tones that are simply stunning.  Birthday Cake smells delicious, like a vanilla cupcake, but it is not overpowering. Hallunication has more of a candy/bubble gum scent. After a moment on the lips, you get a wonderful, clean, Lancome skincare scent. I absolutely love them!  They feel great on the lips. The Lancome Juicy Tubes are in a very small group that have glitter/shimmer but don't feel rough on the lips. If you love glitter, but really hate the rough feeling they leave, then these are for you! They also keep my lips incredibly moisturized and smooth!  I'll also note that, even though these aren't lip plumping products, the way they sit on the lips does make them appear bigger. They also aren't overly sticky where your constantly pulling hair off of your lips!  I totally understand why Lancome chose to name these Juicy Tubes! They really make your lips look juicy and delicious!  I have purchased them in the past, and will continue to buy them!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 07 Magic Spell - sheer magenta with silver sparkle
reviews.review_text: This product gives me a better shine and last longer on my lips than regular gloss does. The benefits of having this product is longer lasting gloss on your lips and it smells AMAZING. I would definitely be buying this in the near future and most def will refer all my friends

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These Lancome Juicy Tubes are awesome. They are easy to apply. I love the colors they came in as well. I love some shine on my lips and these gave me exactly what I wanted. The colors are natural looking, which I love as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these. I have the colors in Hallucination and Birthday Confetti. Hallucination gave me a very light tint and Birthday Confetti was very light with sparkles. Both were very moisturizing and hydrating, not sticky. They have a very subtle pleasant scent. I love them!

The color and shine is good.  The beat part is they are long lasting.  I can eat and drink while wearing and it lasts for several hours.

I would buy it and recommend it to those looking for a high coverage lip gloss!

reviews.review_text: I love this tube! It’s the perfect size and the perfect color! Stays on long and smells good too. I would totally recommend this to friends! I’d definitely buy this too!

reviews.review_text: Lancome sent me 2 of their Juicy Tube lip glosses in the shades Hallucination and Birthday Confetti to try out and review my favorite shade is hallucination it's a nude gloss with gold glitter I like the birthday confetti but it's not my favorite it's a clear gloss with different colors of glitter. The glosses work really well they work like a gloss should I think that since lancome redid the packaging they should've made it look more adult one that comes with a wand in my opinion lip gloss that comes in tubes seem childish and its easier to apply gloss with a wand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I REALLY wanted to love this product, and I was so beyond excited to receive it with my order. I paid for 2 day shipping, and somehow my lipgloss came looking completely busted and gross. The oil had separated and there were heat like induced bubbles everywhere. I decided to look past it, and see if the formula was any good. It was like applying honey and syrup to your lips.  Did NOT make my lips look shiny and juicy either. So sticky, so unpleasant. I wanted this to work.

reviews.review_text: I recently received this free sample and I love it. It makes my lips nice and softer. Great for my complexion. Thank you for the free sample.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. It makes my lips shine like no other and gives them the perfect plump effect. The tube is beautiful too. Lancome juicy tubes is now my new favorite gloss. Its the best im in love with this gloss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. It is the best on the market. The colors are wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, overnight there are over 600 reviews from people who received this as a free sample. I actually purchased mine. Unfortunately, tickled pink smells of watermelon and I absolutely loathe the scent. The colour is beautiful, a neutral dusty rose, and the formula seems the same as it was in the 90’s; sticky and shiny. I hope they bring back some more of their old colours like lychee, which was an opaque hot pink with sparkles and smelled like grape! And also, the old dreamsicle was translucent holo and smelled like orange creamsicle so the new version may be the same.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Both glosses went on smooth and not sticky . The sparkle was just the right amount.  This is a quality lip gloss and I will definitely look for other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very pleased with the longer lasting hydrating quality that was lacking in the other products I have used for years. The color and gloss also lasted much longer than other lip glosses.  I have already picked out other colors I plan on buying and have also told my friends & family about Lancome Juicy Tubes. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this lip gloss. It smells delicious and glides on smooth and easily. The shine is long lasting, and it leaves my lips soft and moisturized without any sticky feeling. These are great to wear alone, or on top of lipstick.  The Hallucination color is my favorite so far, which is a gorgeous pinkish nude with a soft shimmer. I am looking forward to trying out more colors soon! I would recommend Juicy Tubes to anyone looking to for a high gloss lip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love my two Lancome Juice Tubes products. Both variants leave a subtle hint of color with an amazing, yet not too wet looking healthy shine. They are easy to apply, stay on for quite a while (even after eating and drinking, albeit much less intense) and all without being sticky or slimy. They leave a great feeling and even have a quite sweet scent to them. All in all I can definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a chance to try this product free from Bzzagent and let me tell you, I was so surprised. I remember Juicy Tubes from a while ago and never had much interest in them but getting to try them before I bought them absolutely changed my mind. The formula goes on smooth and easy, and it shines on your lips either by itself of on top of your favorite lip color. They smell amazing and even taste good! Juicy Tubes are sure to become a staple in my household. It's hard to find a decent lip gloss these days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like Lancome Juicy Tubes in Hallucination. The shade matches my skin very well. I also love the glimmer and shine it gives my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this gloss, ive used alot of glosses in my day and this is by far one of the best I've used. Its not sticky at all, moisturizes my lips with a touch of shine and has a sweet light scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the high shine and it doesnt leave a sticky feeling on my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this lip gloss and the texture if it and it looked really good on my lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss... I'm so picky about lip glosses and this one is so comfortable with lip stick and it's not even sticky at all and love how my lips looks when I wear the lip gloss alone and my lips feel so soft after wearing plus it last a while but like all lip gloss you still have to reapply! This is my new favorite lip gloss and I do recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this lip gloss. It goes on thick but smooth and leaves your lips feeling super soft. My lips have been dry and chapped from wearing a mask and after using this my lips are soft again and it is the next day! I like the high gloss look this gives your lips as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received both Birthday Confetti and Hallucination as a free sample in exchange for my honest review. Both colors were gorgeous with a hint of sparkle, and are great worn alone or over lipstick. I normally wear LipSense gloss and in my opinion Juicy Tubes are thicker and a little sticky, but overall it’s a great product.

reviews.review_title: LANCÔME Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product and it glides on so easily.  It is long lasting; the shine is perfect and even moisturizes your lips.  I had stopped using lip gloss due to the taste and smell, but these juicy tubes smell great and have no nasty taste if you like your lips.  Juicy tubes are the best lip gloss I have ever used and I do not have to keep reapplying as often as others I have used.  I add it over top of my favorite lipstick and I also wear it alone.  I have tried birthday confetti and hallucinations shades and cannot wait to buy more in different colors.  I never leave home without it and would highly recommend it.  The only reason I did not give it a 5 star is that it is a little pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these glosses. The smell alone is amazing. They feel great on my lips and they have just a slight hint of color. The shimmer is really pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. Total portal back to the 90's. The shine is unbelievable. Plus is smells good. Only downside is I did have a slight tingle to it when I applied it on my lips but it went away quickly and wasn't anything to bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is beyond gorgeous. It's a very pale nude/pink with a pretty shimmer. It feels luscious on your lips. And it smells AMAZING! There isnt a taste to it but the scent is enough for me! If you are a fan of that wet lip gloss look you will absolutely love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try my free samples of Lancôme Juicy Tubes Lip Gloss that I got from BzzAgent. What I like most is that it doesn’t leave your lips feeling sticky like other lipglosses I’ve tried have. The tapered end makes it easy to outline your lips for the perfect coverage and then fill it in for a professional look. I was able to try two different glosses and I loved both. It has a soft, delicate scent that is pleasant. The only drawback is the price per item. If it wasn’t for that, I’d probably own every shade available. Another plus is that it’s sheer, I love sheer lipstick, glosses and crayons. I’ve recommended this brand to several friends and a few have tried it and like it too !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm 46 and often wear lip glosses for a subtle hint of color. But I am very picky about texture and tend to go for something that hydrates but doesn't feel sticky.    The texture of the Juicy Tubes Birthday Confetti just doesn't appeal to me. It's very goopy and leaves a yucky taste and chalky texture in my mouth.   The color is extremely subtle and doesn't do much for me. I feel like it exacerbates my fine lines around my lips.  On the plus side, when I wipe it off my lips, it still leaves a light hydrating coat on my lips. This is the texture I would have preferred from the beginning.   It reminds me of something I would have worn in Jr. High. But I don't think it's a good match for someone my age.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I Love The Color Of This Lip Gloss! More importantly I love that’s it’s NOT STICKY LIKE MOST GLOSSES. My husband liked it on me as well & loved the flavors they offer! It’s perfectly pigmented too!

reviews.review_title: This is going to be my goto shade all summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancôme Juicy Tubes In Hallucination is a lovely golden shade. This is going to be my goto color as for the beach and pool this summer. It will look amazing with a tan! Plus this lip gloss is so hydrating even my chronically dry lips were quenched all the way to the next day. This golden shade will work well by itself or as a topper over a lipstick. I’m highly recommending you purchase this product!

reviews.review_title: I’m in love with this gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this lip gloss! This is a beautiful sheer pink color with iridescent glitter in it. It works great alone or as a topper over another color. Plus this is so hydrating even my chronically dry lips were quenched through the next day. This is a color that will work on all skin tones and for all ages. I highly recommend you purchase this product.

reviews.review_title: I will use this color over everything!
reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed wearing Lancome Juicy Tubes in Hallucination and Birthday Confetti. The gloss is thick and sticky which gives it great shine but comes off on any cup, utensil I touch in a gooey mess. Even so, the gloss lasts for hours and I didn't have to reapply as often as other glosses. I loved combining the two as Birthday Confetti is great for a top color over lipstick and even other Juicy Tubes. Overall, I truly enjoy them. I received free samples for review; all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed wearing Lancome Juicy Tubes in Hallucination and Birthday Confetti. The gloss is thick and sticky which gives it great shine but comes off on any cup, utensil I touch in a gooey mess. Even so, the gloss lasts for hours and I didn't have to reapply as often as other glosses. I loved combining the two as Birthday Confetti is great for a top color over lipstick and even other Juicy Tubes. Overall, I truly enjoy them. I received free samples for review; all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product. Not sticky like most lip glosses.   Perfect for when you want just a hint of color and shine or use it over color for maximum shine.  The gloss is thick and stays in place without being sticky.

reviews.review_title: Cute and shiny but too sticky
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging is really nice it comes with the color on the top, so it's easy to find the color you're looking for. The lip gloss is also easy to apply by squeezing the tube. I got 09 & 20, both colors are super natural. I couldn't tell the difference after I put them on. They look shiny and cute on my lips however it's not very glossy. And it's very moist should be good for winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not a bad gloss. It doesnt leave a sticky feeling which I love and the scent is sweet too! It left my lips feeling super hydrated. A deducted a star because of the price. You can find similar gloss for cheap at the drugstore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked using the Lancôme juicy tubes lip gloss. It didn’t feel as sticky as some other lip glosses I’ve tried, and my lips felt super hydrated afterwards! It gave me just the right amount of sheer color to my lips. I would definitely repurchase after I finish these up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It is very high shine and the color is very subtle but overall effect is beautiful. Stays on a long time compared to other glosses I've used but also isn't a super sticky gloss that gets on everything. Will get other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy tubes have a lovely color and are super long lasting. It has just the right amount of shine and shimmer with that hint of color. It is slightly sticky but way less than other brands. I am amazed by how long it lasts on my lips even when drinking and eating. Leaves my lips looking healthy and radiant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss SO much! This color is my perfect nude! I love how that it is super shiny and reflective and also makes my lips feel hydrated! The tube is also super convenient and space saving in my bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a lipgloss addict and I love these! They are very hydrating and the shine on them is fantastic. Compared to other glosses, they are not overly sticky, while still being long-lasting.   I love that I can wear these alone, or overtop lipsticks or lipliners.  When wearing them this way, they don't cause the lip color underneath to bleed, which is a huge plus for me, as I have aging lips with fine lines.    I would definitely buy these glosses in more colors and recommend to others to buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancôme Juicy Tubes as a free sample to try for my opinion and my opinions are 100% my own. So far this is the best lip gloss I have ever tried. All natural look and lasts forever! Moisturizing all day long without having to reapply multiple times a day. With a sweet taste without a greasy flavor or feel. Actually feels like nothing on my lips at all. Definitely recommend for everyone to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These ultra shiny hydrating lip glosses are so much fun to wear! The colors are perfect to wear by themselves or to wear over lipstick. They remind me high school. I love that they are not sticky on your lips. They are sparkly and beautiful. I received both hallucination and birthday confetti and love both for different reasons. Hallucination is a perfect nude color with just a little bit of sparkle, perfect for everyday use. Birthday confetti has bigger pieces of glitter, and perfect for going out. It would also be a really fun birthday gift.  My only disappointment is that they contain artificial dyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product free from BzzAgent to test out. I am so glad I did because I absolutely love this lip gloss,  it's my new favorite. It definitely helps with dry lips and I love the color with a light shimmer. I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this one the best because it made my lips really shiny and sparkling. I highly recommend this product to someone that likes a little glitz in there lipgloss.  This is the best one thank you for the opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best products i have used and i love lip glosses. This one didnt make my lips all sticky and come off real quick it stayed on all day. This is an awesome product that i will highly recommend to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this lip gloss. Went on super smooth- non sticky. Doesn’t come off right away. Kissable lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great daily lipgloss to use. It moisturizes my lips well without being too sticky. The color is subtle but would go great over lipstick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss has the right amount of everything it really is very moisturizing and has the perfect color and it's not sticky at all and that very important I absolutely love 09 hallucination.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Lancome Juicy Tubes lip gloss. It's my new never leave home without it beauty product. It's not sticky and it leaves your lips feeling soft and hydrated. It's great to use alone or as a topper for your favorite lip color. I definitely recommend Lancome Juicy Tubes and if you haven't already tried it you really should, I'm sure you won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This sparkle, shine & shimmer gloss smells amazing. Not sticky, applies easily & even taste great. Not heavy like other gloss' and looks great alone or with a matte lipstick to add a little pop ! I've tried birthday confetti, a blush pink w/glitter & Hallucination, a peach almost natural w/sparkle. I love them both, would definitely purchase in the future as these were a sample and I am so happy I was lucky enough to try. I would absolutely recommend to all my girls  !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this lip gloss, it was not sticky, super shiny, or even weird to use. I normally get lip gloss pay a lot of money for something that is sticky and rubs off too fast leaving me to keep reapplying. With this Juicy tube it was different it had a nice taste and it was really cool to use and it was not sticky at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried two different colors of these Juicy Tubes by Lancôme. Birthday Confetti and Hallucination. Both were very muted colors. Much more shine and gloss than color. But the Birthday confetti had lots of colorful pretty HD sparkle that shimmers nice in the sunlight. The Hallucination also has sparkle but it’s more of an overall muted light rose Pink shimmer.   Great lip gloss to wear alone or over another lip color if you’re looking for more tint since this gloss is VERY sheer.  Two things I did not prefer. It’s sticky. The kind of lip gloss your hair sticks in and you have to pull it out. And the smell. It smells like perfume and I am very sensitive to smells and I couldn’t stand the smell. Unfortunately I had to wipe it off and couldn’t wear it... The smell for the Birthday Confetti was stronger than the Hallucination. I would have loved it to come in a  light yummy fruity scent instead, or unscented.  If you have no sensitivity to scent and are looking for a sheer sparkle that stays- then definitely try it out.  ***I received this product in return for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Now, the Hallucination Juicy Tube was a better experience. There was less stinging of my lips and absolutely adore the lighter scent and the gold flecks in the very light rose gold color.  I feel like this would give a little metallic, but natural sheen to any color lipstick that I would put on or wear alone with my favorite lip liner. It’s smooth and only gets slightly tacky which I think works for lasting longer. Stay hydrated. Thanks so much for the opportunity to sample this product.  I would definitely purchase this color in the future and it’s decent compared to other brands that I’ve used and last longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this! It wasn't to sticky, the colors were beautiful, and made my lips oh so soft and kissable! Really great product! Keep up the great work!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using my Lancome Juicy Tubes all the time.  My lips look beautiful and hydrated with a touch of shine. They are definitely one of the best glosses I have tried and I can carry them on my pockets for fast applications.  I do recommend for everyone to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute lip gloss, the tube is super glittery with silver stars. The lip gloss itself is now one of my favorites! I wear it everyday. Gives the perfect amount of super shiny gloss without being sticky or drying out. And an added bonus, it has the best taste! You will love it I promise.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice sparkly glossy formula that makes your lips look natural. I really enjoyed the scent and it hydrates my lips. You could also wear it on top of a color lipstick. I would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves a glossy blended look with bigger shimmer dots and this color blends well on my lips. Not much greasy, but it runny .I liked it much better compared to halucination flavour . It tastes sweet but like chewing gum flavour. My choice would be this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves a glossy look with fine shimmer and this color blends well on my lips. But this one is very greasy . Don't like it much. It tastes like ice cream. My choice would not be this as it's ok types.

reviews.review_title: My fav gloss of all time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best glosses out there! Color is perfect. Just enough tint to make tour lips look natural with a nice moisturizing shine. Compared to other brands of gloss this one is not tacky at all, which is a huge plus. It’s moisturizing and lasts a long time. I would recommend to any lipstick lovers as this product also lasts a long time. Overall great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Lancome Juicy Tubes in the color of Hallucination. I love this product! The shade was gorgeous! The lip gloss left my lips soft and the product stayed on for a long time. Most products do not stay on as long. What a great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have colors 09 Hallucination and 20 Birthday Confetti.   I love both of these colors are they are light but with a hint of glitter in them and the gloss look you want.   Can be worn alone or over top lip color to add more of an effect.   Love the light scent, is so creamy and not drying and moistures my lips at the same time.   Long lasting stay is also a plus.   Absolutely stunning product and will buy again and try more colors.   This is superb to any other brand I’ve tried.    Would definitely recommend to anyone!  A must have!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fallen in love with this lipgloss! It’s a very pretty pink with a subtle glitter and is gorgeous paired with a lipstick or on its own as well. It’s so hydrating and doesn’t make your lips feel sticky or dried up minutes after applying. It really stays with you and you don’t need to keep reapplying every 20 minutes like other glosses I have tried. This gloss can take you from drab to fab in seconds!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a product from Lancôme and they did not disappoint! I tried Hallucination and fell in love. It’s a gorgeous neutral/copper shade and it is so pretty on its own or paired on top of a lipstick. This gloss is hydrating and does not leave your lips sticky or dried up within minutes of applying. It really does stay with you as well, without needing to reapply as often as other glosses I have tried. This is a perfect lipgloss for any occasion and you can dress it up or add it to your no makeup makeup look! Very versatile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These glosses are amazing! They're thicker than lip balm, which I like, without being sticky or goopy. The scent of the Birthday Confetti is like a delicious vanilla cupcake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like these tubes. They have just the right amount of gloss and sparkles in them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent Lancôme Juicy Tube original definitely better than other brands I have tried made my lips feel wonderful instantly and already recommended to friends and family

reviews.review_title: Still the best lip gloss out there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used Lancôme Juicy Tubes un high school and i absolutely loved them! I was ecstatic to find out they are back in! The formula is still the same wonderful one. It’s smells amazing, last long, has an incredible shine and not sticky!! Love it so much. Best gloss out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve heard a lot about these glosses and I decided to try out the shade Magic Spell. The smell is so nice! Kind of like a watermelon jolly rancher. However, the gloss feels very goopy on the lips and I get that buildup in between my lips when I talk. Not my favorite gloss but the color is nice. You’re better off getting a tube gloss from the hair store for $2 honestly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These Juicy Tubes are a great way to add a pop of color without tackiness. These would be great for young girls or someone who wants to add just a touch of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These Juicy Tubes are a great way to add a pop of color without tackiness. These would be great for young girls or someone who wants to add just a touch of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: sticky and shiny, more for the teens, but can be used to wear with the regular lipstick to finish the look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm only a chapstick use.. So I was a bit hesitant of I would like these. First of all, the color is so delicate yet very pretty.. Second... It actually has a yummy taste to it!! I was very pleased with these and it changed my opinion on lip gloss. Although sticky feeling... Because it's lip gloss.. I actually love wearing them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancôme Juicy Tubes is a staple in my makeup collection.  The scent is amazing, just the right amount of gloss dispenses when in a rush and keeps my lips hydrated. Love it!  Although expensive, it’s a nice treat for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love these glosses!  I can wear alone or over a lip color. I have both the Birthday confetti and Hallucination and they are both perfect shimmer and scents.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These are absolutely fabulous glosses.  They go on smoothly on bare lips, over lipstick, lip pencil or liquid lipstick.  They leave a beautiful shine and are not at all sticky.  I would definitely recommend them and will be purchasing additional colors.  These are so much better then many of the glosses that I’ve tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very sticky and shiny. Looks and wears like something for a young teen or tween.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Hallucination Juicy Tubes gloss. It is nice and light, and not super sticky feeling. The color is tinted, though sheer, with a bit of sparkle to it. I like how the tube has a flat applicator end, also, as I am not a fan of the rounded end style, and that it has a screw on lid for those squeeze prone people, like myself.   All in all, I would recommend this to anyone looking for a light, fun, good smelling shimmer gloss. It is perfect for naked face or nude palette. I find that it is perfect, also, to go from work to dinner or a date.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Absolutely wonderful lip makeup!  I must admit that when I first received this product to review, I thought.... Oh yeah, this is going to look terrible on me! I was so pleasantly surprised to find out that I was so wrong! This looks amazing on folks of all ages! It feels a bit sticky but it's a lip gloss so that's to be expected. Not to mention it's called Juicy Tubes, as in Tubes filled with Juice. Lol so you kind of have to accept that and move on. Lol  You have to reapply it every so often and touch it up. Especially after you eat or drink anything or if you smoke or vape. Other than that, I have absolutely no complaints about this hot little item. In my opinion, this will definitely make your summer sizzle while being flirty on the beach.

reviews.review_text: I tried Juicy Tubes several years ago and didn't fall in love-they were too light.  I generally tend to like my glosses somewhat sticky, moisturizing and longer lasting. In comparison to other glosses, Juicy Tubes don't last as long as many of the Buxom glosses, but much longer than some of the more basic ones.  Despite the two colors I got (Hallucination & Birthday Confetti), they were equally sheer and didn't add any additional color to my lips, but I am not generally looking for that as I wear over matte lip colors a lot (especially for moisture).  I would buy and recommend, Lancome doesn't tout them to be long lasting, but they fit the bill for moisturizing and are comfortable to wear.

Definitely I would buy it again and would recommend it to my family/friends or whoever asked about it.

The color Birthday Confetti has some pretty big sparkles in it, which is really cute, but as a 34 year-old woman, felt a little bit on the juvenile side for me. I would definitely wear Hallucination on a night out where I want a nice glossy sheen that will last a long time. Overall, this product is a win!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this product reminded me of being a teenager with a sparkly tube of gloss in my pocket. Now that I’m older, I’m not as into the glitter as I used to be. The Birthday Confetti shade is a pale clear pink with many pieces of iridescent rainbow glitter. The shade Hallucination is a Rose Gold with less noticeable gold glitter. Both applied similarly,  with a clear shine and particles of glitter. They both felt slightly tacky/sticky. I prefer a lighter weight gloss with a bit more color payoff (on a tinted shade). I also feel like for the price, I want more of a multi-tasking product with moisture benefits. The Birthday Confetti smelled sweet; I didn’t detect this scent in Hallucination, neither had any flavoring. A decent gloss but I can do just as well or better with a drugstore brand. I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. My review is my opinion based on my experience using the product.

Although I can’t say it’s something I’d put on the top of my list for a lip gloss I’d definitely continue to use.
