reviews.review_text: I love the formula of this product, it is shiny, and creates a barrier for my lips to keep the moisture in. I have been obsessed with more glossier lippies now, and this became my absolute favorite. I may even apply this over my matte lipstick for more glossier look.   I tried various drug store products, but decided that I prefer a more high end, this product is less sticky, and contains less of the fragrance. It applies smoothly and last for 2-3 hours.   Higher brand items like Lancome use safer ingredients, which is good for my lips, and I am not ingesting harmful chemicals.   I would repurchase this product when it runs out, and I recommend this product to my family and friends. I had two of the lancome juicy tubes, I shared one with my mother for mother's day and she absolutely loved it. I noticed that she has been using this product every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pretty skeptical that I would like this. I remember using them when I was younger but I was for sure wrong! It is long lasting and very moisturizing!! They have the perfect amount of shimmer and are so pretty. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how subtle yet pretty this Juicy tube is!! It has a little glitter for nice shimmer but not so much that it's tacky.  Best thing is that it's just a nice smooth feeling and not sticky on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. It is very easy to use and carry. It keeps my lips hydrated for several hours. It smell sweet but not too sticky! I am sure I will try more color in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes creates a pretty thick layer of sticky gloss that definitely keeps your lips moisturized but it also captures every bit of dust, makeup, and hair that may brush past your lips. Do not drive with the windows down while wearing this! The glossiness is gorgeous, but I really can't see more than a couple sparkles and very little color tint, depending on which shade you get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This instantly brought me back a few years to when I was younger and LOVED these lip glosses. Applies and spreads easily. I'm wearing Hallucination in this photo which has a hint of color in the tube but barely shows any color on the lips. Typical stickiness as expected from lip glosses but overall it's a 5 star product to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Always have been a fan of Juicy Tubes. It’s a fun gloss with subtle color, so it’s very natural. Feels great on dry lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am currently using both the Birthday Confetti and Hallucination Juicy Tubes. Hallucination is more a nude gloss with a beautifully subtle sheen.   Birthday Confetti is fun and includes more sparkles!  BOTH ARE OUTSTANDING!!!!1  Both taste wonderful (like cotton candy).  I also use these glosses to go over the lipstick that I had already applied on my lips to make a new and more vibrant glossy and sparkly shade! Gloss goes on a bit tacky (use the applicator tip at the end of the tube rather than your fingers).  Stays put and moisturizes my lips for hours.  Glad Lancome bought Juicy Tubes back because they are totally iconic items!  They are outstanding lip glosses!!!!!!!! And are regular items in my purse and make up bags!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this gloss is bomb! i thought it would be too sticky but the consistency is actually thick and really luxurious. it moisturizes and leaves lips super juicy!! it’s also a pretty decent size that will last me a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how silky this makes my lips feel! Not sticky like a lot of other lip glosses and give my lips a brilliant shine!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My lips looks like natural pink and it was so juicy and perfect for my dry lips. Love this gloss. This is one of the best gloss in the market.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For when I'm doing a minimalist makeup day (beach, cruises, theme parks, etc...) this is my goto lip gloss. It provides a SHEER tint. It also goes well over lipstick and has great staying power.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best Lip gloss (Juicy Tube) ever. It smells amazing and your lips NEVER dry out. It's not like the stuff that makes you keep putting more on because your lips get dryer when you use it. Recommend for an everyday gloss that makes your mouth smells great. Lip glosses are the only thing I put on my lips, and from now on, Lancome is the brand that I am going to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was Worried at First, but am Pleasantly Surprised!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Juicy Tube by Lancôme! The name is called confetti and it smells incredible!! It went on smooth and made my lips feel moisturized for hours. Long lasting for sure!! It doesn’t have that sticky feeling like some glosses do. I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am impressed with Birthday Confetti gloss. I'm not a fan of pink glosses usually but this one I do not mind. It's so light almost clear and the sparkling glitter is a plus. The applicator is easy to use and store. Leaves my lips not overly glossy nor sticky. My lips feel hydrating with a perfect shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this gloss! Received it as a sample and use it on top of my every day nude lip. It’s consistency is thick but I have dry lips so this is ideal for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved Juicy Tubes! It's my go to lip gloss. It gives a hint of color and a whole lot of shine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes exceeded my expectations! It is thicker than other products I have tried but it also keeps my lips moisturized longer. There is some stickiness but not enough to make me not want to use it. Juicy tubes give the perfect amount of shine! I would definitely buy this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has always been a classic and for good reason. Nice texture and feel, smooth and luxurious. Array of beautiful tones, shades. Lips feel nourished, moisturized, and look “juicy” thanks to Lancôme Juicy Tubes. Always used before and will continue to. Worth it! Looks amazing, goes and smooth and last a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been a fan of Lancome's Juicy Tubes. However, I never really loved their scent/taste. Seems as if not much has changed since I started using them back in the early Y2Ks. That's not a bad thing, either. I love the consistency (not too sticky, not too slick), the colors (not too sheer, and just enough pigmentation), and the applicator tip. The one thing that also hasn't changed, and I wish it would, is that slight, sweet smell/taste. These are grown-up glosses and don't need to taste like a gloss I'd buy for my 10-year-old niece. I would definitely recommend these to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The tube comes in a silver box. The tube has a lot of glitter. Presentation is nice and inviting. It smells very good, my husband wanted me to kiss him more! Once applied, it feels sticky and it doesn’t really last long. If it’s windy outside, your long hair can stick to your lips

reviews.review_title: Nostalgia wrapped up in a shiny, SHINY bow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was a trip straight back into my childhood and I loved taking it!  I'm fairly sure the vast majority of girls at my High School was carrying at least one of these babies with them everywhere and I was no exception; I'm thrilled to admit that I am now doing so again!  Easy to apply with just the perfect amount of product, the shine you gain from these little beauties really can't be beat. One application after breakfast, going about my normal routine, and the shine was still noticeable to my husband when he got home from work later that afternoon.  (Mileage may vary depending on how much you eat or drink but I was still impressed he could see it!)    I'd recommend these to anyone who loves the look of shine or sparkle on their lips because these Juicy Tubes deliver both in one lovely little package.  The trip down memory lane is just a bonus.

reviews.review_title: Highly recommended, my go to lip gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: loving Landcome even more. I got to try Landcome juicy tube. Excellent lip gloss. The size is perfect for my purse or pocket.  I love the smell. It's not to shiny. And it last for a long time on your lips. My boyfriend loves the way my lips look, super plus! Highly recommend to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how pretty and shimmery it was. Just a slight touch of pink and shimmer. So Beautiful ! I liked how it just glided on my lips without being sticky. I'm in love !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got one of Lancome Juicy Tubes and it's really juicy.  I feel so sexy wearing it. It smells great ( but don't taste it, it doesn't taste good lol) It was easy to apply and it wasn't sticky. Definitely will recommend it and will buy other shades. This shade is HALLUCINATION and I think would look good on anyone at any age.  I loved it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you love shimmer, you have to get this!!  This lip gloss is an amazingly juicy, moisturizing formula that hydrates your lips and shimmers beautifully!!  I am in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful shade with the perfect amount of shimmer!  The thick and moisturizing formula has done a phenomenal job at keeping my lips hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It goes on your lips smoothly and stays on them forever. So thick and luxurious feeling.

reviews.review_title: Your natural color with a twist!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I would like to say that I received Hallucination as well as Birthday Confetti as a sample. The application is easy and clean!! No sticking a wand back in the product!! The shine is sweet as the taste. Barely tacky after 30 seconds. Hints of sparkles with your natural color underneath!! Worth the price, a little bit goes a long way! Recommend it?? Absolutely!! The application is a breeze with the slanted tube and perfect sized hole for just the right amount of product to be dispensed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved my Lancome Juicy Tubes. It is a great product with a glossy finish and minimal stickiness. I would definitely recommend this product especially in the color Hallucination!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss, I also received Hallucination  and I love that one as well. The shine lasts for hours and they smell amazing, like cupcakes or something but definitely something sweet. Even though they are sheer the tint is really pretty. Will definitely be trying the other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty color its just gloss with a hint of pink. I gives your lips full gloss and stays thick and shinny. Does not come off like other brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Juicy Tubes in Hallucination  (09) and Birthday Confetti (20). They are both very thick and smell very yummy. The Hallucination color does not have as much shiny flakes as the Birthday Confetti but they are both very shiny. A little goes a long way. It is reminiscent of MAC's Lipglass. Although it's too glossy and the nude is too light for my taste, this would be a perfect gloss for a younger person.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lipgloss is perfect for anybody who loves lipgloss! It has a slight fragrance that smells delicious. There is a tiny amount of color, barely noticeable. Like a kiss of color that just accentuates natural beauty. There is something a little bit mature about it. It isn’t sticky, and stays out for a long time. It’s a great. lipgloss to complete any look.  The packaging is pretty and simple. Which somehow makes it feel just like something a little bit special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lipgloss is perfect for anybody who loves lipgloss! It has a slight fragrance that smells delicious. It also had a tiny amount of glitter, but not too much. It’s not like a glittery lip gloss you wear as a teenager, there is something a little bit mature about it. It isn’t sticky, and stays out for a long time. It’s a great lipgloss to complete any look.  The packaging is pretty and simple. Which somehow makes it feel just like something a little bit special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Lip Gloss it is so thick and blends well. Stays on longer than other brands. The color is pretty and feminine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging and the product itself is very beautiful but unfortunately the gloss is very thick and too sticky for me. I prefer a lighter gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this and the Hallucination Ana it’s the best! So luscious and leaves lips perfection!! A must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This juicy tube is the best! The color this and Birthday Confetti are so silky, shiny, high glossed and perfection!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the shades Hallucination, a nude/tan in the tube, and Birthday Confetti, a bubblegum pink sparkle in the tube. I honestly didn't notice much of a difference in the shades when they were on my lips, other than Birthday Confetti being much sparklier! These glided easily on to my lips thanks to the angled tip applicator. However, they were very sticky feeling and there was very little color payoff - I basically just noticed shine (and sparkle in the case of Birthday Confetti). Overall, I think the quality of these is not any better than drugstore brands.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss lasted a long time but it was very heavy, gluey and thick.  I like much thinner glosses. I like it was really shiny and lasted a long time.  There wasn't really any scent or taste.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Juicy Tube by Lancome as a sample and I recommend this product to any woman who is trying to find a moisturizing lip gloss. I have tried many different lip glosses to moisturize my lips and none of them stayed on my lips as long as the Juicy Tubes. I am able to drink and it doesn't come off. I love this product.

reviews.review_title: I love the natural shiny look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I try the 09 Hallucination and Birthday Confetti and really love them. It stays on for hours with the natural shiny look. The tube packaging is easy to use. I can use brush or directly apply to my lips also. I like its cake smell too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this amazing lip gloss! It adds just the right amount of shine to my lips and it goes on smoothly and isn’t sticky. I love this amazing sheer color as well! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancome Juicy Tubes give a great shine. They have a nice fruity smell and even taste sweet. It's a bit sticky so not the best on windy days when you hair can end up sticking to your lips.  I like this gloss best when I wear it on top of my lipstick to give my lips some dimension.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love my Juicy Tubes. I thought it was was gonna be more liquidity but it wasn’t. It went on like lipstick. My lips were popping. Love the colors. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don't usually wear lip gloss bc most are sticky. This is not. It's colorless, had a nice candy like scent, smooth buttery like feel and keep lips hydrated for a long time. Even after eating and drinking. I've even used it before bed and woke with my lips moisturized. Great if you live in the desert where it's very dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My review is on the Hallucination and Birthday Confetti Juicy Tubes.  I loved juicy tubes from before and they are just as good now.  You can wear them alone or on top of your favorite lipstick, but they are better worn alone because the lipsticks don't stay on if you wear them underneath.  They give your lips great hydration and shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My review is on the Hallucination and Birthday Confetti Juicy Tubes.  I loved juicy tubes from before and they are just as good now.  You can wear them alone or on top of your favorite lipstick, but they are better worn alone because the lipsticks don't stay on if you wear them underneath.  They give your lips great hydration and shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received for BzzAgent  two juice lip gloss , I love the two colors nice hydration long lasting in my lips , leave shine my lips , don’t have scent.. not sticky .  I love la come product , cute package ../ thanks BzzAgent for this opportunity for share my Ionian and my honest review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received “Birthday Confetti” & “Hallucination”.  Birthday confetti is my favorite!  It is a sheer pink with multi color shimmer in it.  It has so much sparkle in it!  It’s beautiful! Hallucination is a bronze-y/copper with gold shimmer.  It is pretty too, but doesn’t look great with my skin tone. I’m not a huge fan of the applicator.  It’s a tube with a slanted tip.  I just prefer a wand to use because the tip gets a little gunky! The gloss is also a bit sticky.  It’s not too bad though.   I like that you can’t really feel the shimmer in it.  It just feels smooth on the mouth.  I received these for free.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product at no cost. It's a soft pink almost sheer i like to wear over a lip stick or alone. I like that its not sticky that your hair sticks to it. It left my lips feeling soft & hydrated, I would recommend to friends & family

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss! So far this is my favorite lip gloss that Lancome offers. The shine is perfect, the texture is perfect, and it's long wear. It stays on my lips for hours after applying. It hydrates your lips too keeping your lips looking healthy with no flakiness from them being dry. Lip products look horrible on chapped lips. Your lips aren't sticky like other products cause, and your lips look more plumped. Lancome Juicy Tubes are my new go-to lip gloss. I will always have the Birthday Confetti in my purse so I'll never run out. I highly recommend Lancome Juicy Tubes. You won't be disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received samples of this product through BuzzAgent. I got 2 different shades: Hallucination & Birthday Confetti. I really liked them. Easy to apply, I love the color and shine. The only thing I didn't like was that they were kinda sticky. Other than that they're awesome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancome Juicy Tubes # 9 Hallucination and # 20 Birthday confetti products are really beautiful and of high duration and long-lasting hydration for up to (4h), very easy to apply since their tip offers the necessary amount that you want to apply to obtain a delicate texture and sensual. Both were received completely free to try and review. I am passionate about JT because it not only provides brightness but also color, that is, it is multifunctional. They are products that every woman should take into account when obtaining a perfect look ... I am sorry that I found the perfect solution ... JT is visibly noticeable to other people when you wear it on your lips .. .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love its texture, it leaves my lips soft and hydrated. They are very cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the color and the formula of the lip gloss. It felt very smooth going on my lips. It didn’t feel sticky at all, which is a problem for many lip glosses. Not this one. It stayed on for quite awhile before I had reapply. The color was sheer but enough to be seen. I really enjoy this product.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting, neutral lip gloss with a shimmer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss is nice and thick and it stays on for hours. It has some glitter in it, which is subtle, and I don't mind it. It has about the same consistency as Victoria Secret's lip gloss. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t used Lancôme Juicy Tubes in years. Now I don’t know why I ever stopped. They are so beautifully packaged. I have dry lip lots and enjoy the moisture my lips feel when I’m wearing Juicy Tubes. They add just the right amount of sparkle and shine with a hint of color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great color for summer and smalls so good! These will be in my purse, ready to use on the go for the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color, smell, and feels great on lips! Smells so good it’s like I can taste cake!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancome juicy tubes lip gloss in Birthday confetti and I absolutely love it.  The birthday confetti is a clear sparkly lipgloss with a very slight pink tinge. It is great to wear by itself but I love wearing it on top of my nude lipstick. The lipgloss glides on easily and was not overly sticky.  This is perfect for adding shine to your lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received two free samples of Lancôme Juicy tubes- Birthday Confetti and Hallucination. The color on both of these is fantastic! It goes on smooth leaving your lips with a fresh and subtle shine with a hint of glitter. I found that it lasted a long time as advertised and it provided great hydration too. I would definitely recommend this product as a go to gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I cannot begin to express how much I love these. I wore these back in the early Nineties and am SO glad Lancôme brought them back. They're even better than I remember. They feel a little sticky going on but they don't wear that way. They smell and taste delicious and the shine is unrivaled. (20) Birthday Confetti is an almost clear pink - youthful and iridescent. (09) Hallucination is a gorgeous shimmery, peachy neutral. I wouldn't change a thing about these. So grateful to have them back in my life! Thank you from the bottom of my heart!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found my new never leave home without summer gloss!!  Not toodark not too light it matches a great tan and leaves my lips soft, hydrated . I love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little too light in color for me but I still liked how soft my lips felt. Not gooey or too thick & sticky. Had a touch of sweetness in aftertaste. I will be adding to my collection bit in darker shades. Great for summer beach weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving the formula of the Lancôme Juicy Tube. It’s so nice, feels nice and smells great. Most of all they are perfect for summer for a nice glowy natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving the formula of the Lancôme Juicy Tube. It’s so nice, feels nice and smells great. Most of all they are perfect for summer for a nice glowy natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome lip gloss. Sheer shine color that is somewhat sticky but stays well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall great product left my lips feeling smooth and tinted most of the day. I would definitely reccomend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss gives a beautiful shining fish to the lips, either on top of a lipstick or on nude lips for an everyday look. It goes on smooth and you only need the tiniest amount to achieve a beautiful look. It smells like candy, it takes me back to my teen years of fruit-flavored chewing-gum bubbles. Perfect for every day as it is very hydrating. Easy to apply and it is smooth and soft on the lips.
I thought this one would be really brown but it's not.  The color is light and goes good on top of a lipstick. I would by this one again.
I love the color. I love lip gloss and this is by far the best one out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes are great for keeping my lips moist and healthy. I love the colors and variety available.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting, juicy, hydration for your lips. Many gorgeous colors to choose from, for every day wear, to out to party looks. Keep your lips looking and feeling extra juicy with Lancome Juicy Tubes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting, juicy, hydration for your lips. Many gorgeous colors to choose from, for every day wear, to out to party looks. Keep your lips looking and feeling extra juicy with Lancome Juicy Tubes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love to feel my lips with a sweet gloss which you can apply alone or on top of a lipstick the sensation you have is unique your lips feel juicy sensual and most importantly super hydrated for more than four hours you can wear it and wear it many times  It comes in a variety of three shades with a rich flavor that will make you feel radiant. Its design is great. I recommend it if you want lips that shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I first received my juicy tube I immediately loved how simple the packaging was! My 8 year old is obsessed with the cute stars on it. I got major 90’s vibes from it and I’m a 90’s kid so that already won me over. This gloss is so pretty on! Not only is it pretty the consistency of it is not too sticky and not too thin. Something I always pay attention to with glosses. I’ve been wearing it everyday since I got it. It gives you a nice glisten to the lips without being over the top. This will definitely be my go to lip gloss this summer for the days I don’t want to wear lipstick. It even smells DELICIOUS! Overall I love it and recommend it 100%!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. It is amazing. The colors are beautiful. It goes on smooth and not sticky like other glosses and it stays put for hours. It leaves my lips feeling smooth and moisturized. I will definitely be purchasing more colors. A must have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how long lasting and subtle the color is on this one. It’s not sticky at all like other tube glosses. It leaves your lips shining and luscious looking for hours! I’ve got 2 little girls who are obsessed as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love lip gloss! Over the years I have tried numerous types and various brands. Lancôme Juicy Tubes are one of the best! After applying this gloss, it glided on easily, leaving my lips with a fresh but lightly wet look. Lancôme’s gloss is not sticky but instead give my lips a slightly gently glide. Not only did this product last longer than average lip glosses that I have tried in the past, but it gives my lips a natural color boast in addition to keeping them moist and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these Lancôme lip Glosses. They have a beautiful silver box package and a cute tube container holding the gloss. The tube reminds me of Junior High and my favorite lip glosses. These have a beautiful sheer sparkle and pleasant sweet scent and the classic sticky feeling when on the lips. I received this product free for review but all options are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, I’m a big snob when it comes to stuff I put on my lips. It has to have an excellent smell, taste, texture, wear and look. It gives a great shine, has a yummy smell, tastes sweet not at all chemically and even once the shine wears down it leaves the lip feeling conditioned

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Lancome Juicy Tubes they come in different shaded but very light and subtle you can wear then by themselves or over your lipstick to give it some extra shine, i find them to be slightly on the sticky side but not too bad, i think they are great for when you want to go with soft natural makeup, i love them and can't wait to try more shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss and makes my lips soft and it's not sticky. It also comes in beautiful colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very great product   Leaves your lips looking shiny

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancôme really outdid theirselves!  Birthday Confetti is a Lighter Pink with gorgeous sparkles in it & Hallucination is a very pretty brown sugar color that I absolutely adore as well! I’ll be wearing Birthday Confetti on my birthday all day and night for sure! I love the fact that these are glosses that look good on all skin tones and literally all a girl needs is a little bit of gloss and she’s good to go, baby! These Juicy lip tubes are everything a girl could ever possibly want in a lip gloss. My lip gloss is popping! That’s for sure!! I absolutely adore the names of each color range of gloss. And by far my favorite thing about these glosses is that they aren’t that gross kind of sticky gloss that we all hate! These glosses are boujie of the boujiest!  Love that the shiny gloss actually makes lips look plumper and fuller. Not to mention the sparkle is spectacular. I have already recommended these to my friends, family, and followers. And I’ll be buying more! For sure!! Stock up ladies, and gents! I can see these flying off the shelves before you know it. Highly recommend these beauties in a tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Smell is important they have a beautiful smell lasts long when I wear alone not sticky my top in bottom lip dont stick or have that gooey feel high quality gloss juicy is a great name for it because the thickness great scent and shine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These give your lips a sheer tint of color.  This one on me is more on the clear side.    Makes your lips look healthy and juicy!!  This gloss also has gold sparkles but doesn't feel gritty.  Outdoors the lips look so shiny and shimmery!  They are a gloss so they're not going to completely dry down but they do dry down some.  Also they are comfortable on the lips, but they do have a slight tacky feel to them.  Nothing major, but I know some people don't like any tackiness.  It's not the lightest formula of a gloss I have tried, but I still do like it.  They actually do give your lips some moisture, not just shine so that's definitely a plus!  I do use it while and home and toss it in my purse when I'm going out.  These glosses would look great with a bronzy summery makeup look.  The packaging on these is great, clear tube with angled applicator, and a cap/lid  that is secure.   Birthday confetti pulls more clear on me, not really a strong color compared to hallucination which you can tell is a brownish sheer color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very pretty addition to a natural makeup look.  It's very subtle, not too shiny or glittery, but cute and fun.  I honestly found it to be sticky, but I think lip gloss typically is.  I think it's a great product, however maybe a little pricey for lip gloss.   I'll reccomend it to my wealthiest friends

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the look Lancome Juicy Tubes gives my lips.  The color is subtle while the shine is anything but!  It makes me feel my lips look pretty and sexy.  To me, they feel sticky, though.  But many of the lip glosses I've worn over the last three decades have, so I'm used to it and it doesn't really bother me.  I would love to buy one in each of the neutral shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked them Juicy Tube Hallucination shade that I received to review. This gloss gave great results for color tint, durability and shineyness, plus it did a nice job of leaving my lips nice and hydrated and soft.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting shine without a heavy feeling gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am not much of a lipstick wearer, but rarely go without lipgloss. I rarely go without gloss. I am so glad to have found Lancôme Juicy Tubes, it’s my new go to gloss.  I love Birthday confetti. It’s the perfect gloss for any occasion. It has a very slight pink tint, but really comes off translucent with major shine and a little glitter. It glides on easy and is super long lasting. I love that it is thick enough to stay put, but not so thick that it has a sticky glue feeling. It maintains a neutral look, but has enough shine to be able to wear when dressing up.  I love layering this gloss as well. I have layered it with #09, Hallucination, to add a little color.  The 0.5 fl oz size tube is perfect for carrying in a small purse or clutch. Since a little goes a long way, the tube should last quite a while.  I don’t have any negatives with this gloss. It is my new go to and I am looking forward to trying other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally love these Lancôme juicy tubes! They are not sticky and glides on easily. Even my sister love the color. Highly recommended to get them fast before they are gone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancôme’s Juicy Tubes! I am not much of a lipstick wearer, but rarely go without lipgloss. I am super particular when it comes to gloss, and this gloss delivers.  Hallucination is a gorgeous neutral golden shade with lots of sparkle. It glides on easy and is super long lasting. I love that it is thick enough to stay put, but not so thick that it has a sticky glue feeling. It adds a hint of color to maintain a neutral look, but enough shine to be able to wear when dressing up.  I love layering this gloss as well. I have layered it with #20, Birthday Confetti, to add a little glitter.  The 0.5 fl oz size tube is perfect for carrying in a small purse or clutch. Since a little goes a long way, the tube should last quite a while.  I don’t have any negatives with this gloss. It is my new go to and I am looking forward to trying other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the Juicy Tubes. I was worried they might be sticky because similar products I used had been but this was not. Instead, I really liked the feel of the lip gloss, as well as the scent. The color was sheer but pretty - perfect for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received hallucination and birthday confetti.  Hallucination is such a pretty nude color, it is not super pigmented but it gives just enough color.  Birthday confetti is  pink with sparkles in the tube, on the lips it is just a shiny clear looking gloss with a little shimmer.  I love that it is in a squeeze tube.  They both smell amazing!  They leave your lips looking juicy in the best way.  It lasted a long time on the lips.  It is just a bit sticky, but nothing that was a deal breaker.  It is comparable to other glosses I have tried.  I would totally recommend this product.

reviews.review_title: Amazing, I love it!! Glosses are Trending.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wore this on top of a matte lip stain & just on my lips. I just say both times I was super impressed with the product. The consistency is perfect not super thick & not thin & runny. It goes on so good (reminds me so much of high school), not sticky, gives an amazing sheen with a bit of nude look. The product also doesn’t leave a white residue after long wear around the inner parts of the lips. I love it..  I have only 2 very minor issues, the glitter but what’s so good about that is, it’s not as visible on the lips as it is in the tube & as we all know lipglosses needs a retouch after a while but this really lasted me for over 4 hours with just 1 application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is awesome and gives your lips an amazing shimmer. It lasts on your lips for quite a while so you don’t need to reapply very much! Overall I love this product a lot and would rebuy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: I love this lip gloss. So simple to just pull out and use. I like the light tint in it. Very easy to apply and makes my lips so shimmery. Would definitely recommend this. Great product.

reviews.review_text: I recieved two Lancome Juicy Tubes free to review, one in the shade Birrhday Confetti, and the other in Halluci-Nation. reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these little Juicy Tubes, they are amazing! Perfect for every day and for dressing up! I received birthday confetti and hallucination, love them both. Thank you Lancôme and BzzAgent!

reviews.review_text: Got this from Bzzagent. Love these glosses. My new favorite gloss. Glad it is not greasy. Has glitter in it. Love everything about this gloss.

reviews.review_text: The product has a high moisturizing level, keep my lips looks juicy for a long time. I like the squeeze style tube. They are easier to get gloss out and waste free. The best point that it is not sticky like other lip-gloss. Highly recommend this product.

reviews.review_text: I am in love with this lip gloss. The shine is amazing and actually lasts. If that isn't enough it also hydrates your lips and leaves them feeling smooth. My new go to lip gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So excited to try these out.. gives your lips that extra shine and sparkle also very hydrating, love these lip gloss

reviews.review_title: So happy juicy tubes are back !!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am seriously a obsessed with lip gloss. So I was ecstatic that Lancome Juicy tubes were back. I had the juicy tubes years ago and I was obsessed. I'm so thrilled to have them again and they are just as I remember. I was lucky to get hallucination and birthday confetti and I absolutely adore both glosses. I cant wait to try more shades. These lip glosses are not sticky or too thin. I love that it is thicker than most lip glosses I've tried. They have the perfect texture. Plus they dont leave that tacky residue on your mouth like so many others do. The gloss lasts hours on my lips. It gives just the right amount of color and shimmer Tommy lips. And I love that the glosses are scented. I cant say enough good things about this brand and the juicy tubes. I will always be a fan of Lancome juicy tubes. As long as they make them I will buy them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancome Juicy Tubes for free from bzzagent to sample in colors Hallucination and Birthday Confetti. The tubes them self were cute, with the birthday shade having silver stars. The gloss itself was sparkly and had delicious scents (Birthday Confetti-Vanilla and Hallucination-Fruity)!! It was a thick consistency and was not oily at all! Great quality. I would recommend these items to anyone looking for a good moisturizer for their lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've used Juicy Tubes off and on for about 20 years now, ever since they first came out and became a status symbol among my middle school classmates.  I was obsessed from the first moment I sampled a friend's Juicy Tube and subsequently dragged my mother to several department stores begging for the just-barely-there pinks. To this day, the smell of a fresh Juicy Tube evokes the most pleasant nostalgia to me. While the smell has evolved somewhat over the years from a honeysuckle to more of a vanilla, I still get that giddy feeling every time I open one and breathe it in.  I love the feeling of Juicy Tubes on my lips and I love the glossiness. I never get that gummy, sticky feeling I get with some glosses and Juicy Tubes stay and stay. My lips feel moisturized and soft. Even with the glitter in my current favorite Birthday Confetti, I don't feel like an overly glossed preteen. The glitter is subtle and just adds a glossiness to my lips. I don't think it's meant to be plumping, but I always feel like my lips are a little bit plumper when I use these as opposed to other glosses.   I love the packaging (also hasn't really ever had to change!) and how much control you have over the product application.  I'm so glad that Juicy Tubes have remained for sale all of these years. They've taken me through my pre-teen years all the way into working-professional-adulthood without changing their formula too much and remaining one of the very few products that has been a mainstay of my makeup bag for 20 years!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the shine! Don't care for the glitter in Birthday Confetti, but love Hallucination! Only downside is that they make my lips tingle & I don't care for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! This are my favorite glosses by far! Such a nice, luxurious feeling. I never leave reviews but I’m in LOVE.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss! The packaging is very attractive and recyclable, it smells like heaven, and it is a very flattering color on me. Definitely not the BEST lipgloss I've ever experienced as it is not very long-lasting and the shine isn't up to par with some other brands, but this is a very subtle and natural finish. It's not sticky, either.   This tube was a little bit weird, however. There's a crazy amount of bubbles! Like, ALL OVER the tube! I'm not sure if it was just poured incorrectly, but I feel like you don't get your money's worth as half the tube is air.  I was looking for a nude gloss to put on top of a nude lip, so this worked out pretty well for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great lipgloss. It smells great and the packaging looks great also. It goes on smooth and feels great when it’s on your lips. You can squeeze just the right amount you want on your lips and it come out perfect. The shine looks great on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss! The packaging is very attractive and recyclable, it smells like heaven, and it is a very flattering color on me. Definitely not the BEST lipgloss I've ever experienced as it is not very long-lasting and the shine isn't up to par with some other brands, but this is a very subtle and natural finish. It's not sticky, either.   This color appears more sheer than pink, but my lips are naturally pinker. The pink would probably appear on darker lips or paler lips. The glitter is a little bit grainy, but it's not terrible or unbearable. I don't rub my lips together very often so it's not a problem for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a free sample. This lip gloss is the best tasting I have tried in some time. It provides a super high shine, and makes my lips feel better when I wear it. Often I find this type of lip gloss sort of goopy but I don't get that feeling with this product. I like that it isn't heavy color but instead enhances your natural lip color. I would purchase the birthday confetti and recommend it to everyone I know.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is not as dark/colored as it seems like, but it feels great! not too sticky, not too liquid.  The price is acceptable and it smells/tastes great (I did not ingested it, but you always get a sensation).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the smell of the juicy tubes is absolutely amazing! it is very nice subtle color :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got two samples of lancome juicy tubes to try for free from bzz agent: Hallucination and birthday confetti.   The first thing I have to say is that the smell and flavor sensation is great (I did not ingested it, but you can always feel some flavor/odor combination).  I have to highlight this because, most of the gloss/lip care smell/taste weird/awful.  I like that the product is not super sticky, neither it is super liquid, it has an optimal texture. The birthday confetti one is simply great.  I was checking at the web page and they have several shades which is good and the price is acceptable.

reviews.review_title: Lancome Juicy Tubes Color 20 Birthday Confetti
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with my new Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss Color-20. I really love how smoothly and easily it glides on. I like that you can wear it as just lipgloss or you can wear it on top of your favorite color lipstick or lip color. Either way your lips look and feel amazing. I definitely recommend this product to everyone. I love all the compliments I get when I wear it. I like that this product doesn't feel gritty like most lipgloss with shimmer and shine does. I really like the smoothness of it on your lips. I definitely have a new must have for sure. Get yours today and you'll be so glad you did.Best birthday confetti ever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad I got a chance to try the Lancôme juicy tubes after so many years, I remember having a couple of them when I was a teenager and I used to love them! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love my New Lancome 09 Hallucination lipgloss. I love how smoothly and easily it glides on. I love how smooth and soft it makes my lips. I really like how you can wear it just as lipgloss or you can use it on top of your favorite color lipstick or lip color. No matter how you wear it your lips will look and feel incredible. I really love all the compliments I get when wearing it and recently I laughed so hard. Someone asked me what I was wearing because the really liked the way it worked.
