I also liked the stickiness of the product (not too much) as it provided long wear time.  I didn't love the smell of this product, but I don't tend to like fragrance in my beauty products.  Great for an everyday gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product and I enjoyed using it.  There isn't much color, but it provides a nice shine.  I also liked the stickiness of the product (not too much) as it provided long wear time.  I didn't love the smell of this product, but I don't tend to like fragrance in my beauty products.  Great for an everyday gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love my Lancome Birthday Confetti sheet pale pink with sparkling confetti glitter. It brings me back to when lip gloss was lip gloss, when it was glossy and shiny. Truly the  best lip gloss I have used in years. Easy to apply, long longest. The tube will last a long time, even if you apply several times a day. I have brought several so I have one in my purse, and every room of my house. LANCOME Juicy Tubes are my go to lip gloss. I highly recommend this lip gloss you will love it. It also makes a great gift for your girlfriends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this gloss!  Luscious on the lips and keeps lips hydrated for a few hours!  Really adds shimmer to your smile!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lip gloss is perfect to layer over lip balm and lipstick. It makes your lips soft and shiny without stickiness. The mint flavor is appealing and it also exfoliates your lips. I love this product and have been recommending it to all of my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Lately I've been wanting to add some shine to my lips and this is to perfect lip glass to do so! Although it is a little sticky, it keeps my lips hydrated and mosturized all day, which I love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried out two of these. One was the slightly colored “Hallucination” & the clear “Birthday Confetti”. First, the shine is impressive. These have light reflective particles that make these things almost light up. Second, they small great (but light). Hallucination smells mildly of bubble gum, while Birthday Confetti smells like vanilla/cake. Third, they feel great on. Fourth, there is a slight sweet, barely there, flavor.  Hallucination adds just the slightest hint of color on your lips...almost none. Birthday adds no color.  This is slightly sticky. Your hair will tend to stick to your lips if it comes in contact. When pressing lips together, it’s slightly sticky.  They really are beautiful glosses, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color love the shine. Was hoping for a little more color but none the less, it was pretty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the Juicy Tube. It has a weird name but it really makes my lips pop and is moisturizing. With other lip glosses, they leave a strange feeling on my lips that is uncomfortable, causing me to wipe them off, but I didn't have that with these! Also there's so many shades to chose from, you can match your lip shade to get a nice natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes has high shine and can be applied with or without lipstick with it, I thought this was very moisturizing but at the same time a little sticky although it lasts all day while wearing, I did like the shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a lip gloss junkie, I had high hopes for Juicy Tubes, but I was disappointed. I know that lip glosses are supposed to be sheer, but this color was so sheer that it looked like I was wearing just a clear lip gloss with a few sparkles mixed in. Also the gloss had a sickeningly sweet candy taste and fragrance that was way too overpowering. Skip this one-there are better choices.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this gloss. It really is high shine and great quality. It’s been around forever which means that it works! I highly recommend this if you like having kissable and shiny lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it great lip gloss. Stays on, wonderful color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm jumping up and down that this product is back! I got it years ago when it first came out. It gives a shine like no other. It is thick and a bit goopy depending on how much you use, but I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is better than I remember it being. Juicy was big when I was in high school, but this is not like the sticky gloss of yesteryear. The gloss gives a subtle shine without being the main feature of a look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The gloss is a little thick, but not suffocating or sticky on the lips. Its very comfortable and hydrating, they smell sweet, leaves a clear glossy sheen on lips with a iridescent shimmer. The packaging is so cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Juicy tube are a little thick, but not suffocating or sticky on the lips. Its very comfortable and hydrating, they smell sweet, leave a nice glossy sheen that shows up clear on  me with a fine gold shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I suffer from dry lips, and I was happily surprised with the Juicy Tubes by Lancome. From the first application, my lips felt supple and hydrated. The color choices are lovely and sheer - perfect for everyday wear. I was afraid that these would turn out like high school era lip gloss, and while it is glossy, the gloss is subtle and luminous - very adult. I love my Juicy Tubes! I own Hallucination and Birthday Confetti, and I wear one or the other every day. A single application lasts for several hours, even through a meal. I recommend Juicy Tubes to everyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Juicy tubes are my absolute favorite! As a lip gloss addict, I have tried them all. From the very expensive to the less so. Other glosses leave my lips feeling dry & chapped as they wear off, but Juicy Tubes are one of the VERY FEW that last a long time & then when they do begin to slowly wear off, they leave lips feeling moisturized as if you'd put a lotion on them- SO MOISTURIZING! They do not feather or bleed at all like other brands do on my mature skin. Also, my favorite color (Hallucination) will adapt somehow to match absolutely any color I happen to be wearing, whether it's a cool or warm pink, red, brown, or neutral tone. All around, Juicy Tubes are the best lip gloss out there & so very worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a clear lip gloss with specks of glitter, you might love this. Just keep in mind that the lip gloss has a soft vanilla-ish fragrance to it and it's a bit sticky. I would recommend it to people who's not that bothered with the stickiness that lip glosses often has.  Overall, its a great product and I love the colors as it's not that opaque.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a nude lip gloss that isn't too pigmented, I would recommend you this. I love the color and the smell of the lip gloss as the fragrance isn't too overpowering. But, I wish it's less sticky. So, I wouldn't really recommend it to people who can't stand the stickiness of lip glosses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never been a fan of lip gloss, seriously. However, I am now a huge fan of Lancome Juicy Tubes. I love that this product is light, not sticky, and have a sheet finish. The color is just enough, they are gorgeous, and they even smell delicious. I also love that a little goes a long way, so the product really last. Also, you can wear alone or even pair with your favorite lipstick. The gloss really is versatile and fun. This is better than other glosses that are sticky, heavy, cakey, and typically leave absurd amounts of color. I am so glad that I found Lancome Juicy Tubes. They are definitely a must-have product for beauty lovers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: .I really love these juicy tubes.they look great,make your lips feel hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect lip gloss.  Not to be confused with lip gloss from the past that is sticky and tacky.  My lips were hydrated without being sticky with Juicy Tubes.  I really like the shimmer and shine they give to my lips.  The scent was pleasant and they coordinate well with springtime makeup looks.  I would love to have one of each flavor.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sent Lancôme Juicy tubes to sample out and I absolutely love them. They are not to sticky and the glide on easy compared to others I have tried. They stayed on for along time before having to apply again. They leave a nice shine and sparkle to your lips. My daughter wanted to try and she absolutely loved them as well. My favorite is Hallucination which is more like a natural color for me. I would recommend this product if you are looking for something that lasts for your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Lancome Juicy Tubes in the shade of Birthday Confetti~ I was in LOVE with this lip gloss!! It's easy to apply~ the texture is creamy and felt light on my lips. It's appearance is SHINY & SHIMMERY~ a definite EYE CATCHER!! My ABSOLUTE NEW FAVE lip gloss~ I HIGHLY RECOMMEND the Lancome Juicy Tubes to you as well!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG! this gloss is the best! i was glad to use it again.super glossy,stays on for a while,creamy and rich,but not sticky.plus it smells delicious!just love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes original lip glosses are great! I have this particular shade and love it. The color and shine look great! Feels great and has a light pleasant scent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 10/10 would recommend this product to anyone who wants the perfect amount of sparkle and sheen. The color just tints the natural lip color, so it isnt too dramatic.

reviews.review_title: Don’t skip Juicy Tubes they are reflective
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So wet looking!  The formula is not sticky but a little thicker which gives it staying power but it feels nourishing not heavy at all. I can hardly remember other that how wet and nourishing my lips feel. The glitter isn’t like gloss mixed with glitter it’s more like specs of reflective in the gloss. It is Amazing and make my

reviews.review_title: Juicy tube gives me glass lips
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So wet looking!  The formula is not sticky but a little thicker which gives it staying power but it feels nourishing not heavy at all. I can hardly remember other that how wet and nourishing my lips feel. The glitter isn’t like gloss mixed with glitter it’s more like specs of reflective in the gloss. It is Amazing and make my lips look like glass

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the high shine and formula.  Not thick or goopy, feels moisturizing on the lips.   But it has a perfumey scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful light shimmer!  Long application and very hydrating to my lips. Perfect for all skin tones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product because it adds just the right amount of subtle color on my lips and really hydrates! I like that it moisturizes my lips without feeling super sticky! This works great on it's own, but also adds a nice shine when used over lipstick. This is a great product and I definitely recommend it for a great lip shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lip gloss tubes are great.   Shine without being overly shiny and the colors are perfect.  Just the right blend.  It was not super glittery, but just the right amount of glitz.  Not too thick and sticky and the application lasts for a few hours.  Portable for quick touch ups.   I didn't really notice any scent at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These lip gloss tubes are great.   Shine without being overly shiny and the colors are perfect.  Just the right blend.  Not too thick and sticky and the application lasts for a few hours.  Portable for quick touch ups.   I didn't really notice any scent at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the shimmer and light color offered by the gloss, but it’s a bit on the sticky side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! It made me very nostalgic for my teenage years. This color gives a good amount of summer without being obnoxious, and the scent is wonderful. It doesn't make your lips too sticky so I didn't have to worry about it rubbing off on my hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the Juicy Tube I received as a sample from BzzAgent!! Easy to use, great size, super shiny, and hydrating!! I definitely will be buying this in the future!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like that this Lancome Juicy Tubes has really nice thick texture that is really comfortable to wear all day.  I like that it has nice hint of color that is noticable but also lasting.  I feel like it made my lips super soft but help to keep them moist in a good way.   I like that it didn't have that sticky feeling after it left them more healthy and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love wearing lip gloss.  It brightens any look, from everyday casual to special occasion chic.  Lancome Juicy Tubes Hallucination added the right amount of gloss.  The pop of pink was creamy and perfect.  Lancome Juicy Tubes Birthday Confetti was a fun gloss.  The shimmer and sparkles were cute.  This product is long lasting so I didn't have to reapply often as compared to other lip glosses.  I enjoyed these lip glosses and would recommend them to others.

reviews.review_title: I’m in love with Lancôme Juicy Tubes
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancôme products and this one did not disappoint! It’s not sticky as I worried that it would be. The shine is perfect. After I remove my makeup my lips stay hydrated after using the Juicy Tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this lip gloss! Compared to other lip glosses, it's pretty standard. Adds sparkle and shiny to the lips, with not much for pigmentation, and has the expected smooth and sticky ratio. It goes on smooth, feels comfortable on the lips and doesn't seem to feel sticky when you smack your lips together but its sticky enough that if the wind blows your hair will get stuck. The glossiness it gives to my lips is exactly what I look for in a gloss. It doesn't have a strong taste or smell, its like a light floral, vanilla almost, which I like because its not overbearing. I also like this gloss because it can last a long time if I'm not eating or drinking. I went a good 4 hours without having to reapply the gloss which was great!

reviews.review_title: Makes your face look done with just a bit of gloss
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect shade to make your face look done with this Juicy Tube from Lancome.  That is why it is called Hallucination.  If you put this gloss on suddenly your whole face looks like your all put together or done.  I'm not a huge wearer of makeup lately with the lockdown, I haven't been going out and I haven't been able to get back into my routine.  I was so excited to try Lancome's Juicy Tube Hallucination.  I put it on and the color matched my lip tone perfectly and the shimmer and shine were so subtle but somehow was just enough to make my entire face look finished.   I recommend this to anyone, especially anyone who doesn't feel comfortable wearing a lot of makeup, this is perfect.    It hydrates and feels plump and rich for hours.

reviews.review_title: Birthday Celebrations are for all ages!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I received this Juicy Tube in Birthday Confetti to wear I thought after I review this I think this is going to end up in my 23-year-old daughter's bag.  I opened it and immediately I got a scent of sugar and it reminded me of those days opening those glossy tubes of our first makeup encounters. It was a nostalgic feeling.   The angled applicator makes getting the perfect amount of gloss for your perfect pout as easy as pie.  Most lip gloss applicators are a wand full of goop, impossible to retouch your makeup without risking getting it on your clothes if your on the go, or ruining a perfect pout. I thought the glitter was going to be a bit much for me.  But no, this is a fun touch a sparkle that you can add to almost any look.  I would recommend every woman have this is in their tool chest for that girls night out or a special night in with your partner. The price point is pretty friendly to try out different shades, and it hydrates and lasts on your lips for a long time, well past the coffee test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent shine with a splash of pale pink.. a classic style while adding fun.  Will recommend to family and friends.  It is trusted brand that always compliments almost every skin/eye colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this lipgloss! It provides the super juicy finish that you want from a gloss. It is hydrating, thick and is the perfect level of sticky. When worn with a lip liner it has lasting power. Nudes often look too yellow on me but this color is lovely and would look great on any skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancome Juicy tubes from Bzzagent as a free sample to try. My lips felt hydrated and soft. I would definitely recommend this product to others.

reviews.review_title: Such a fun gloss to wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm am so happy Lancome has brought back the Original Juicy Tubes.  I haven't used these in years and has bought back so many great memories.  I am not a big lipstick user, but use gloss quite often.  I received both Birthday Confetti and Hallucination for review.  Hallucination is a great color for me - love it, and Birthday Confetti is just so much fun.  Love the sparkles.  They feel just the same as I remember on and lasts.  Love the way it glides on so easily.  The Juicy Tubes smell good and do not leave a sticky feeling as many others do.  I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family and will be purchasing some in the future (want to try other colors).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm am so happy Lancome has brought back the Original Juicy Tubes.  I haven't used these in years and has bought back so many great memories.  I am not a big lipstick user, but use gloss quite often.  I received both Birthday Confetti and Hallucination for review.  Hallucination is a great color for me - love it, and Birthday Confetti is just so much fun.  Love the sparkles.  They feel just the same as I remember on and lasts.  Love the way it glides on so easily.  The Juicy Tubes smell good and do not leave a sticky feeling as many others do.  I would definitely recommend this product to friends and family and will be purchasing some in the future (want to try other colors).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great lip gloss. Lasts a decent amount of time also. Pretty colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved these as a teenager and I love them still!!! Just as I remembered them! I received these in exchange for a honest review and I'm beyond exctited that I did!!!  These are lightly tented and full of sparlkes!! Not heavy or stick in the least bit!! Last for hours too. I love them! Can't wait to get the whole collection!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I thought the Juicy Tubes were okay.  I got two, birthday confetti, and a nude-ish one. I would have liked more color. I think these are perfect to put over a color or added shine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing at hydrating without the stickiness, weight or hassle of most lip glosses. I love the consistency of the formula plus the glitter, of course. Lancome rocked it with this five star product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing at hydrating without the stickiness, weight or hassle of most lip glosses. I love the consistency of the formula plus the glitter, of course. Lancome rocked it with this five star product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm am so happy Lancome has brought back the Original Juicy Tubes. I absolutely love this ultra shiny hydrating lip gloss. They feel great on & really last. With such a great glossy lip. I definitely recommend checking out Lancome Juicy Tubes to give you a great look & lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes Original Lip Gloss in Color Hallucination is a great production. The color is a perfect nude, gives my lips shimmer without too much shade. This product's packaging is similar to other products that you squeeze it onto your lips, very easy. What I like about this product compared to others is that it does not have that extra-sticky feeling. It is just very smooth lip gloss. I would recommend this product to my friends and I would buy this again in this color or in others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely the best lip gloss that I’ve ever used! This gloss glides on easily and it’s very thick so it adheres to lips perfectly. It hydrates lips so they feel soft and smooth. The gloss stays on your lips too without wearing off easily.     I love this color too, it adds a subtle hint of pink with sparkles. Lips feel soft and smooth and aren’t left feeling sticky at all. This gloss has a high shine to it which I love because it looks so pretty on! Definitely a product that I’d purchase again and again! I highly recommend this for anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for review! I absolutely love this Lip Gloss! I isn’t slippery! It lasts a long time! It isn’t sticky! I have never tried anything like this in my life! I absolutely love this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. Like the way it stays longer than most lip glosses. It is a bit thicker, but totally fine with it.

reviews.review_title: Cute, hydrating, but possibly a little bit tingly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I thought it was very cute! It has been so long since I got a glittery gloss, so I'm not for sure if that changes anything.  Anyway, it actually does hydrate my lips (I live off of chapstick, so I was a bit surprised)! I can say, though, that the gloss makes my lip tingle (as if it had some of the same ingredients as a lip plumber), but I don't think it does that for everyone since I have extremely sensitive lips (I had other people try it, and they didn't feel anything).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love these lip glosses, they are beautiful and not sticky, they glides on easily and smell really good.. I love the glittery shiny look and how it hydrates my lips.. this is a must have..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so thrilled to find out that Lancome was re-releasing my favorite lip product from when I was younger: Juicy Tubes! They are so smooth going on and last for a while on your lips. Moisturizing with just the right amount of shine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I remembered that this was one of the classic OG lipglosses back then. Im very lucky to have to the opportunity to try these glosses. Tried both birthday confetti which is a sheer glittered pink and hallucination which a sheer sparkly golden nude. These glosses have just the right amount of stickiness without being heavy on the lips. I use the glosses alone or on top of my favorite matte lip colors. They hydrate my lips and made them shiny and juicy looking. Perfect for spring and the upcoming summer months. Great for a glossy and fun look, for touch ups or when your matte liquid lipstick seems a bit dull looking. Lancome's juicy tubes is indeed a classic makeup staple in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the Lancome Juicy Tubes lip products. They have good color tints and a nice shine to them.  The gloss lasts a good amount of time and is moisturizing. It is a bit thick and can feel tacky if you are not careful with the amount that you use. The glitter is noticeable and a fun addition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This gloss is so shimmery and reflective,  It comes in a squeeze tube and is so much simpler to use then ones that come with a wand. It doesn't have any odd taste like some do and also don’t have any odor.  It’s a great topper for your other favorite lip products, or looks beautiful on its own. It also doesn't leave lips feeling dry, or sticky. The shine lasts a couple of hours and only needs to be reapplied a couple of times during the day or after a meal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this it smells great and gave a light shine and sparkle to my lips. Not grease or heavy. And it’s my bday month so a extra plus and the fact that I received these plus 1 for free with Bzz agent to true for honest opinion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this color! It's beautiful and goes with anything. The gloss itself isn't nearly as sticky as other lip glosses and actually feels like it's moisturizing my lips! It lasts a decent amount of time before I feel like I need to apply it again. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent gloss, shimmer and just a hint of color. Perfect feel on my lips. Love these tubes,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LIP GLOSS! This was such a huge thing in my days! The packaging screamed QUALITY! The scent is amazing for a lip gloss and the shine is spot on! The texture feels luxurious!! This lip gloss would work better on women with fair skin however. The color doesn't show up much at all on my lips. All in all I was pleased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received two Juicy tube lip glosses, Birthday confetti, and hallucination. Birthday confetti was pink and with lots of sparkles. The container was even sparkly! Hallucination was a sparkly nude color and a bit tone down but I loved them Both.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

However, Birthday Confetti felt gritty with the confetti glitter such that I'd never consider wearing it on a date.  It also started tingling like a plumper with in a few minutes which didn't stop until I got freaked out and wiped it off.   I don't know why it would be so different than Hallucination that I wore all day with out issue.

reviews.review_title: Lancôme Juicy Tubes... just how you remember ‘em!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a true blast from the past... I remember my pre-teen self always had one of these in my Limited Too shoulder bag (which had my initials embroidered on it... duh). After not trying a Juicy Tube in maybe 15 years this product makes me feel nostalgic. It still feels like the same exact formula. This is a thick gloss and slightly sticky. You will feel it on your lips and not forget it’s there. It’s not going to last all day but on the plus side when it starts to fade away it will leave your lips feeling moisturized underneath. As far as the appearance if you like a very glossy lip I don’t think you can do any better than a juicy tube. Another plus is the shades are soft enough that you can layer the gloss on top of a liner or lipstick for a glossy finish. To me, the scent is not my favorite and doesn’t compete well with newer products in the same category. Personally, I prefer a more natural scent- this could be a light floral or just an essential oil. This scent is more chemical to me and a little too sweet smelling that it’s nauseating. If you like a very glossy lip and don’t mind feeling the product when you’re wearing it then this is the gloss for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so worth getting if you have never tried it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Birthday confetti is a pretty, sparkly translucent gloss that is, in my opinion, best worn over other solid colors to really make the sparkle shine. However, it can also be used on its own to add a touch of Shimmer and gloss to a minimalist look. The formula is smooth, but one concern is that it is a very sticky gloss. It will definitely transfer if you are eating or drinking, and be cautious about your hairstyle because fly-away hairs will definitely stick to this gloss.

The only negative thing I have to say is that it is a very sticky gloss, making it very vulnerable to transferring onto cups, straws, etc and any flyaway hair that may get in your face.

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancome Juicy Tubes. It is a very shiny lip gloss, and the glitter adds to that. The glitter is fine, so it's not like you end up with big sparkly chucks, which is nice. I was concerned though, as I don't do products with glitter in them unless it is the biodegradable glitter that they make out of I think seaweed. Have no idea what kind of glitter product is in this and for me personally, would find out the answer before I committed to buying. It is also sticky on the lips, more so right after application. I didn't really fault it for this though, cause I expect glosses to be a bit sticky. But the main reason I gave it 4 starts is because after wearing it all day (the stickiness fades as you lose your coating thru the day) my lips were super soft. They hydrated them better than most of my chapsticks.

reviews.review_text: I received free Lancôme Juicy Tubes from BzzAgent, and I am so grateful. Lancôme Juicy Tubes are a perfect lip gloss in my opinion. I received two shades and scents. The first is called “Hallucination.” It’s a nice light-nude pink with a gold sheen and sparkle. It smells amazing! Almost like fruity cotton candy, it smells actually delicious. I love the feel of Juicy Tubes on my lips, because it’s not too sticky like some glosses I have used. It’s moisturizing and hydrating, while staying put for a long time. It has just the right amount of sparkle and color. The other color I received was named, “birthday confetti,” and like its name suggests, it smells exactly like a piece of cake with vanilla frosting. Just delicious!! It is light pink in color, with a bit of silver sparkle and sheen. I love having these on hand to finish off any look. I would definitely recommend Lancôme lip products to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a light shimmery gloss, these are definitely worth checking out. The formula isn’t watery and thin but it also isn’t very dense and sticky.  I’d say a good in between point where it’s thick enough to last, but doesn’t feel heavy on your lips.   I enjoy that the shimmer particles are very fine, so they won’t irritate your lips and you won’t feel any scratching.   The main selling point for me is the packaging. I do not like getting my lip colors on gloss applicators, and altering the color in the bottle, so the squeeze tube is perfect for avoiding that.   The Only drawback is that the pigment is very sheer so there isn’t much color payoff. But you can comfortably wear on top of a lip color if that is a concern of yours. For me personally, it’s not a deterrent from purchasing more colors in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: In what can only be the best throwback to the 90s and 00s ever, Lancome has brought back their Juicy Tubes along with a better formula and tons of nostalgia. I'm loving it! Gone is the sticky, goopy mess that was still much covered back in the day. This new version gives me a lovely shine with absolutely no sticking or goop. It also smells delicious and stays on a whole lot longer than the original version. Just lovely to wear alone or on top of a matt lipstick

What I've noticed of this compared to other glosses, is that it has a longer wear time and is not quite so sticky in texture.  It is beautiful and I love Lancôme products!  They are consistently quality!  Note:  It recommends to use this with Lancôme lip stick... I prefer it alone!  It is gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so grateful to see all of these other women saying the same thing!! Juicy Tubes are the BEST gloss out there. I have been wearing them for over 10 years- and I have tried to find a suitable replacement- but NOTHING COMPARES. All of these other lip stick/gloss fads are drying and do not wear well over time. Even your other glosses, Mademoiselle Shine for example, and the others, are drying where I have to repeatedly apply and my lips begin to peel. I’ve never had this issue with the juicy tubes.  The viscosity of the gloss, the lengthn of it's wear, how my lips remain soft and supple, how I don't need to keep reapplying, and how beautiful it makes my pout- is WHY I love it. Please bring this tried and true product back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: Lancome juicy tubes orange ish color review The packaging for the product was really elegant. It came in a periwinkle, metallic little box. The box was clearly labeled with the brand, product, and color. When opening the box, first sight of the product shows a beautiful soft light nude colored gloss, with a ton of glitter. Upon opening the product itself, the product smells delicious. Not too strong or cheap smelling, just a light fruity smell. The gloss itself is very thick, but slides on very smoothly. It is not goopy or chunky looking. The glitter in it isn't overbearing. The color is soft, and delicate. Absolutely loved it! Not only do I reccomend it, but I plan on purchasing it myself.

reviews.review_text: The  lip gloss is in a plastic tube, it is proposed to apply it with an oblique cut of the plastic nose. I consider this the most hygienic way, and for me it is more convenient than the fur or foam applicators built into the tube or lid. The gloss is dense, in most shades there is a small beautiful shimmer, perhaps this is the most persistent gloss of all that I had, it gives a very beautiful visual effect, it is economical to use, it does not flow into the creases of the lips, it does not slip, it does not smear along the contour even without lip pencil, excellent holding, moisturizes and smoothes lips, as well as slightly enlarges the lips, they become puffier. . The aroma is pleasant, sweet and citrus, it does not feel on the lips. Very beautiful gloss, these overflows and shimmer, I like and recommend it!

reviews.review_title: Sticky & Goopy Just Like They Used to Make 'Em!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A wave of nostalgia compelled me to order one of these the moment I saw it. But as soon as I applied it, I realized my mistake. Cosmetic technology has made such vast improvements in the last 20 years that I'd forgotten what it's like to wear a sticky, goopy gloss that catches every flyaway hair. I'd much rather wear a modern shiny-but-not-sticky lip oil. Also, I'd forgotten these have that sickly sweet fake-melon scent. Basically, this is the cosmetic equivalent of bringing back the steel-belted bullet bra—why would you when you could use something new that works so much better?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used to think that Lancome was my mother or my grandmother's makeup brand. I was so wrong! The last couple products that I've had the privilege of trying have been so fun, the packaging is hip and unique, and the product was so mosturizing! The flavor I tried was birthday cake. It wasn't so much a flavor variety as it was a different packaging covered in stars and the smell was heavenly! It smells just like cake. It also had glitter in it. The other gloss that I tried was just a beautiful glossy nude shade that was gorgeous. My lips were lightly tinted and very shiny. I loved the way my lips looked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to be picked for this campaign for Bzzagents as I'd used the original Juicy Tubes when I was a teenager just starting to experiment with makeup! L'ancome makes great makeup and true to that, these don't disappoint! Can't wait to try some other shades now that I now they carry these again! For reference, I have on the shade Hallucination in the picture.

reviews.review_title: The year 2000 called and wants its look back
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are dying to relive your high school days, then this is the gloss for you.  it's such a throwback to the early 2000s!   Everything from the shape of the tube, to the scent and the extremely sheer (virtually clear) color with huge sparkles.......  Since I have long hair, I usually don't wear gloss, because the mere suggestion of a breeze causes my hair to stick to my lips.  However, if you have more manageable hair than I do, these glosses aren't really that sticky---nowhere near the stickiness of say, the old timey MAC Lipglass.   But the downside is that they obviously don't last long on the lip.  Maybe an hour at most, assuming you don't eat or drink.   (And if you do, you'll leave an ugly mark on your cup or glass.)  The Birthday Confetti color is almost completely transparent and colorless on the lip, save for the giant sparkles.   It looks pink in the tube, but there's no color in reality.  On the lip the sparkles are fairly sparse, but sizewise...they're giant, and a little childish......  I guess you just have to be in the right mood to wear a gloss.  It's high maintenance, and super-impractical, but it also gives you visibly plump looking lips, and it screams nostalgia!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the juicy tube Lancome birthday confetti is just perfect it does not leave your lips really colored but it does hydrate them and gives you just a hint of color does it leave your lips feeling slimy or sticky just the perfect amount of shine I highly recommend this lip gloss

reviews.review_title: Bringing back the 90's! This gloss is POPPIN!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Want to go back into time, where juicy gloss was in every girls back pocket or purse? Step back into the 90's (or come for a visit if you were born after the 90's) and relive it with Lacomes Juice Tubes!!   I was so excited when I knew this was a product that I would be testing out! I was always a fan of lipgloss tubes when I was a young girl. Nice glossy lips with a little bit of stick to them. (though from what I remember the stick back then was a tad bit more stickier than this gloss is. The glossier the lips the better in my honest opinion.  Both of the glosses I received (which was Hallucination and Birthday Confetti) were awesome and made my lips feel hydrated and look glossy! I literally was suffering from summer chapped lips (YUCK!!) and applied it to my lips and felt instant coolness on them. Look out chapstick you might be put away for a little bit while I have these glosses in my possession. (Muahahahaha!!)  *Ahem*   Ways to apply to your lips:   Apply to naked lips. Apply on top of lipsticks to really bring a shine to that lipstick. Apply to dry or chapped lips   Overall...   This was a super sweet blast from the past! If you're looking for something that makes your lips look super glossy without that icky sticky feeling that typical glosses leave behind I recommend buying this brand of gloss! You will not be dissapointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the package. The glosses are inside a sturdy box to hold the gloss individually. I loved the colors of the glosses. When I opened them, they smelt AMAZING. I liked Birthday Confetti more altogether, due to smell and the more pink tone. They both felt very hydrating, they were lightly glittery - meaning it’s not overboard on glitter. They didn’t feel sticky really unless you apply a lot - but my hair did catch into it a few times, no matter how little or how much gloss I applied. Overall, one of the best glosses I’ve tried since doing makeup! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I was so excited when I heard that they were bringing the juicy tubes back. I got two colors (birthday confetti & hallucination). First off i just wanted to say the formulation has been changed from the old ones (for the better or for worse? I can't really tell after just a few days of use); but so far I like it alot. I don't know if it's just me, but the gloss stays moisturized for longer than the old tubes (yay!) But I will say that the smell of the gloss was changed. It's not the sweet fruity scented gloss it was before anymore. The  birthday confetti smells like birthday cake (as expected), and I love the smell and the taste on my lips. Hallucination reminds me of something more floral and more on the perfumey side. Not my favorite, but I do love the color, so I guess it's a tradeoff. The quality of the gloss itself seems to be the same, high gloss, moisturizing, long lasting gloss!! Overall, I am so happy that these are back, and I am begging you (Lancome) to make these a staple and please dont discontinue these glosses again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this for free for my honest opinion but that will not impact how i feel. Cause let me tell you! These lip glosses are awesome! They are thick and buttery! They feel so good on my lips! They smell good too! Most other lip glosses are either to thin or to thick. This is perfect! I wish mine did have a little bit more glitter in it. But it's perfect either way!  I would definitely recommend this lip gloss when someone asks! I also got the Original Hallucination Lip Gloss as well and i feel the same way as i do with the other lip gloss!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love!!! Smells great and super thick and glossy. It's also very moisturizing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Porcelain skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Yay for Lancome Juicy Tubes! So happy to have gotten these. I got two shades, left is 09 Hallucination and right is 20 Birthday Confetti.  The formula of these is amazing. It is a thicker gloss, so if thin glosses are your thing, well, try these anyways. My lips felts so hydrated after putting these on, and it definitely felt like it would keep the moisture locked in even on a cold windy day.   The description of the glosses is right on. An original juicy lip gloss with ultra-high shine, four hours of lasting hydration, and the perfect amount of sticky cushion texture. The sticky cushion texture is just as you would think. Not too sticky, not too thin. My lips were left soft and not gummy or messy-sticky.   Both of them also have some sweet scents. 09 Hallucination reminded me of a jolly rancher, maybe strawberry or watermelon flavor? 20 Birthday Confetti had less of a scent, but it was still sweet. And neither tasted bad if they got in my mouth, they tasted just as they smelled, sweet and candy-like.   The two shades I got gave a nice sheer coverage with some shine and sparkle, so if you are afraid of bold color, these are for you. The applicator is like that of the Laneige Glowy Balms. They are similar in coverage and scent-intensity as well. I'd say the Lancome Juicy Tubes are thicker, however.   Overall, I thought these were great glosses and I would love to get some more shades. They are perfect for on the go and easy to throw in a bag. I definitely recommend these. I received these products free to try from Bzzagent.

reviews.review_text: I got my tube in the mail today and I was so excited that I had to try it on right away! The applicator was nice and distributed the product well. But the shine! I got the Birthday Confetti & Hallucination glosses, both of which are advertised as part of the sparkle shades. And boy do they sparkle! Birthday Confetti is an almost colorless gloss (a slight pink tint, but not noticeably), however, it is indeed very recognizably sparkly! I think it looks so nice on, it is so so pretty, and it would work great on top of some lipstick as well. The next shade, Hallucination, does have more of a tint to it. It's a nudish gloss, and like Birthday Confetti, it is very sparkly!  Both glosses did not feel sticky or tacky, they felt very smooth and, from what I can tell, moisturizing.   I have seen some complaints that these new juicy tubes aren't scented/flavored like the old version, but since I never tried the precious Juicy Tubes I have no complaints! I am thoroughly enjoying my new glosses.

reviews.review_text: This is by far one of the best lip glosses I have ever tried. Unlike the cheapy kind that is sticky - this feels so smooth and comfortable on the lips. Just apply it, and wait a few minutes before smacking your lips together.  Once you do, it just feels so smooth - not like any other lip gloss that I have owned. I highly recommend it, and will certainly be purchasing more flavors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a product I received as a free sample. This is apparently a return product but I'd never tried it before. I was definitely missing out. These are great. They smell nice. They aren't sticky. The formula isn't too thick. I think the shades that I received Hallucination and Birthday Confetti make perfect toppers for liquid lipstick but they are also great to wear alone. My lips feel hydrated and not sticky. These glosses are very high shine. And even though I didn't use them before the components feel very nostalgic. I would definitely recommend these lip glosses..

I would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking to purchase a great lip gloss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great shimmer and shine. Lasting color, smells great! Love that you only need a small amount for great coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Juicy Tubes are a total game changer when it comes to lip gloss! The tubes themselves look so pretty with the gloss in it. On top of that, it goes on so smooth and really leaves my lips feeling hydrated, and leaves them with a nice neutral color from the gloss. It isn't sticky which I love and it applies a nice but not too thick coat. I would reccomend this lip gloss 100%!! It even smells great too!

I absolutely adore the subtle scent of roses while applying this product. This gloss is has a nice thickness and shine to it, making it inevitably a tad sticky - but nothing too bothersome. I love how the glosses (the clear gloss in particular) are in tubes because not only does it give you full control of product distribution, it does not contaminate the rest of the product with colour when used as a topper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have two shades of Lancome's Juicy Tubes in the shade Birthday confetti and Hallucination. Birthday confetti smells like its name so beware of any cravings!! It has the right amount of glitter in it. In my opinion, its perfect as a topper on a liquid lipstick. Hallucination is a golden nude shimmer which can be perfectly worn alone or as a topper as well. They both smell yummy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so happy they brought these back. They bring back childhood memories. This formula literally last all day. I’m in love with how thick it is. I will definitely purchase another one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're a gloss girl, this is like the holy grail! Love everything about this gloss! From the applicator, to how it glides, it's not tacky, the heavenly scent, to the hints of glitter in it. This is a must have honestly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love that they brought these lip glosses back because it brings back memories of those wonderful scents just like this one has of watermelon. It’s not sticky but provides shimmer that I enjoy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Where’s my butterfly hair clips and my pink Nokia phone? Because the 90s/00s are making a comeback! These glosses bring back so many memories. So glad they’re back. Lancôme brought back some classic shades and some new ones. The Birthday Confetti is new to commemorate the 20th Bday of Juicy Tubes. These glosses aren’t sticky, they’re slightly tacky, keyword slightly. This particular shade BIRTHDAY CONFETTI has a subtle vanilla scent. Think Bath & Body Works Warm Vanilla Sugar. I love that the juicy tubes comes in a variety of scents from gourmand to fruity. I’m wearing it as I write this review. HYDRATING, BRILLIANT SHINE! The glitters in these things are so finely milled that it doesn’t feel like you’re rubbing sandpaper on your lips. If you’re looking for a Juicy pout, try one definitely give Juicy Tubes a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The texture is still the same but the scent is no longer fruity and sweet tasting. It now smells like perfume with a tiny hint of fruit and tastes like perfume too. Disappointed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I know the nostalgia of the Juicy Tubes, but when I tried on the Marshmallow Electro light pink shimmer shade it just was not doing it for me. The formula is still left in the 2000s which falls flat in comparison to more modern iterations of tube gloss and gloss in general. The shade and shimmer is beautiful but what does that really matter when the formula gets goopy in the waterline? You can put the smallest amount on and there will be patches of clumped up gloss in the inner lip that stick and get stringy when you talk, aka my worst nightmare with gloss. It isn’t thick like Mac Lipglass, or sticky like Glossier, it’s buttery but it just feels less hydrating and slightly dry, like a cold butter that is hard to spread. $20 for this tube is essentially cashing your check for nostalgia purposes, and if that’s what you wanna do with your money then go for it, but I will be enjoying my Tower28, Colourpop, Jouer, Fenty, Pat McGrath, Ciate, and other brands that actually got the formula right. I’ll give it 3 stars for the color/shimmer as it’s gorgeous, the original packaging and easy application, but remove 2 stars for formula and price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m so glad Lancôme brought these back!!! I was obsessed w these in the 2000s so they’re super nostalgic for me, plus they are an awesome lip gloss— shiny, long lasting, and just a great gloss all around.

reviews.review_title: Not sticky, but tacky and so, so shiny!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a sticky lipgloss, but it is quite tacky. Hair will stick to it and it will go everywhere. Every tube smells different (this is Watermelon) and the shine is unparalleled. It's a classic product. I keep one in my pencil case for touch ups! It's sheer but fairly opaque.

reviews.review_title: Get them! Perfect gloss, shine, and no stickiness
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As soon as I saw these were back I immediately ordered Framboise Pop and Pure. There is the SLIGHTEST tint of colour in the Framboise Pop, they do read mostly clear.  The shine, the texture, everything is perfect with Juicy Tubes. If you don’t like sticky or goopy gloss, these are perfect for you! I am so happy Lancôme brought them back, and I do hope they’re permanent <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The tube isn’t filled all the way and has air bubbles, but that’s ok. This reminds me of when I was a young child and my mom would put these on and it looked like jelly on her lips! These seem to be the exact same juicy tubes my mom used to love. The shade I got is a gorgeous baby pink, sheer and looks like glass on my lips. Makes my lips look JUICY. I already can’t wait to pick up tickled pink and clear, and I’ll probably end up getting the rest of these. I do think the price could be cheaper because the packaging looks very cheap and dollar store-ish. But the product is a 10/10 and you do get a lot of product for the price, I would recommend these to everyone I know

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best non sticky shine! I’m so happy this is back.  Perfect on its own or to add gloss on top of any lipstick or stain!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I remember these from when I was young. My mom bought these all the time and she got me one cause I wanted to start wearing make up. I loved them. They were so hydrating, not to sticky. They smell so good. Gives you a bit of colour but a lot of shine. Will get one for sure. Hope they bring out more colours ❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I remember when I was 10 years old and my mom bought one of these for me because I wanted to start wearing makeup. These lipglosses have been such a huge staple in my life! I love them so Much! There not to sticky and they give the perfect amount of shine! I’m so happy that they decided to bring these glosses back!
